"First I think the dog is stupid. Then I think he's crazy. Now I'm playing charades as if he's been changed into a dog by a banshee, and there's only one of those here: Kat."

Dan finally heard most of the words and was so overjoyed he began to turn circles then run around the yard and finally rolled over in front of the fence, happily barking and panting with the silly dog smile all dogs display. Gus then shook his head and started to walk away mumbling he needed to call his doctor about his medication creating hallucinations. Dan couldn't let this happen and barked ferociously even louder, but Gus just went inside.

"No. Please, Gus, no. Come back." Dan's emotions just dropped off a cliff. He hit bottom so hard with defeat that he was now utterly lost and miserable. What did he have left? He lay dejected on the ground his eyes watering with disappointment. Then Dan remembered the medallion around Kat's neck. Soon she'd be home, and he would have to try for it.

"I still have one chance." he thought as he closed his eyes and rested waiting until ...

1111111111112212221211212211212112122.content:
When Kat first got home, her mom told her that Dan had been barking up a storm earlier and the neighbors were complaining. Then she asked Kat, "Did you feed him this morning?"

Kat sheepishly said, "I didn't have time, but I'll get it to him right now."

"Katrina, if you can't care properly for him, you can't keep him. There's only one day left until I decide."

"Yes, mom. It won't happen again." Kat said as she hurriedly slapped some food in a bowl and brought it out to Dan.

Dan had heard Kat's car pull up and was waiting anxiously for her and the food, but mostly he was waiting for his chance to grab the medallion from around her neck so she would loose the magic and it would break the spell changing him back. At least, that's what he figured would happen. His spirits had now swung back up after failing in his try with Gus. He paced by the dog house as he waited.

Shortly Kat came out with the bowls. "I understand that you've been making noise so the neighbors complain. That won't get you free little brother, so you better behave. There's still things I can do if you don't accept your fate by tomorrow." She paused looking at him sternly with that glint of evil in her eyes.

Dan was bouncing around her happily with quiet, friendly barks as she spoke and trying not to think any words. Hopefully, she would think that he lost of his ability to communicate and that she would blame his being a dog for barking and not give any punishment. Fortunately, all she did was holding the bowls high while she chastised him which made him so hungry he almost forgot his plan.

Kat finally took the bowls and bent over to place them on the ground. Dan had backed off and as ready. As the bowls hit the ground and Kat's lowering head give the necklace forward momentum, he rushed forward. Kat thought it was for the food, but Dan went right for the swinging medallion.

With timing and luck, Dan caught the medallion perfectly in his mouth and tried to run off thinking it would break loose; but all that happened was that Dan pulled Kat off balance, and she landed face down on the ground. Dan was now standing over her with a firm grip on the necklace so that it was choking her.

"Wha..ak..t are you doing?" Kat gasped barely able to talk with it pulling tight against her throat.

Dan bit hard, several times, and the necklace eventually broke so he could dash away with the medallion. Kat pulled herself up and catching her breath called to him, "You're in real trouble now, Dan. Not only did you almost choke me to death, but you broke mom's birthday gift. She is really going to tear into you for that."

Dan stood on all fours a couple meters away waiting for the spell to be broken. ... Nothing happened. He heard Kat's words and waited. ... Still nothing. He began to get concerned.

"Did you think that by taking that trinket that you would take my magic, maybe break the spell? Boy, or should I say dog, maybe dumb dog. You are making things get really worse for that. Give it back now, and I might consider some leniency." She held out her hand and gave Dan the most evil look ever.

Dan now realized that his plan was probably a mistake, but it seemed so logical at the time. Medallion equaled magic power. Maybe it really did; but if it didn't, was he ready for the consequences. Looking only at her hand, Dan walked slowly toward her and dropped the medallion from his mouth into her hand.

Looking disgusted at the slobbery object, Kat held it up and was trying to figure where to wipe it off, but she still had on her good clothes from her morning appointment. Finally she just clasped it hard in her hand, and a big smile broke out as she laughed, a mad power laugh.

"That's a good dog, Danny. And a good thing you gave back or I wouldn't have been able to do this." With that said, she waved her hand and said something Dan couldn't understand but it wasn't because of being a dog. He knew she was casting another spell on him, and he backed off waiting for something terrible. But Kat just stopped and smiled.

"Yeah, good thing you didn't wait too long or the spell would have been broken; and as long as you had the medallion, you would be safe. But TOO LATE NOW!" and she laughed even harder.

Dan felt absolutely miserable. His plan was sound, but he had been fooled by his sister. If only he had held out. The pain of failure played heavy on his mind. Dan wondered with great trepidation what spell she had done, but feeling no different and still being very hungry, he went for the food and began to chow down drowning his sorrows.

After a few bites though, he began to feel like something was pricking him with pins. He looked around, but didn't see any reason for this. Then he felt like something crawling on him followed by an very intense itching and more pin pricks. Instinctively, he pulled his hind leg and began to scratch himself, first on one side, then the other. He turned and used his teeth to nip at whatever it was that was on his hips and around his tail. He became more and more frantic as the itching was everywhere and getting extremely intense. Kat began to laugh and turned back to the house.

Dan was manically clawing and biting himself but could hear Kat yell to their mother when she got inside.

"Dan's got fleas. He's scratching himself like a mad dog." and she giggled at that.

"Well," Dan heard his mom say, "You'll have to give him a flea bath ... and no using magic. You have to show you can take care of him without."

At that Kat came charging back out of the house extremely upset and ready to take her frustration out on the first thing she saw. Of course, what that was was Dan.

She looked at him with as much hate as he had ever seen. He cowered as he watched Kat ...

Dan wasn't paying any attention to Kat as she stormed out of the house and suddenly stopped. He was preoccupied with the little creatures in his fur that were tenderizing his skin with their tiny blood sucking bites. Although the bites were painful and seemed continuously happening all over his body, it was the itching afterward that was truly maddening as it grew up everywhere they had bitten, which was actually, everywhere. His skin had become so sensitive that he could also feel their teeny legs crawling around almost tickling him in further torment.

Dan scratched with his hind legs. He pawed where he could with his front legs. He used his teeth to try to bite back and also scratch all around his lower back, tail and rump. The fleas had no qualms about getting under his tail, on his balls and all over and almost into his sheath. He reached with his snout, tongue and teeth trying to clear them off, but they immediately came back. It was so bad that he was licking his rear hole ignoring the disgusting taste and smell to try to stop them. Even worse was his try at nipping them with his teeth and accidentally sinking them too hard on his tender sack.

With a yelp, Dan flipped on his back from the sting he just did to himself. Fortunately, this made him discover that rolling on the ground, in the dirt especially, was more effective than all his scratching or biting. Unfortunately, it didn't stop the fleas from continuing their performance. After all, they came from a magic spell that just kept them coming back so they would provide entertainment for quite a while. Like a three ring flea circus, they executed their agonizing acts beautifully as Dan rolled and flailed like an upside-down bucking bronco, but to little avail.

When Kat stopped, her face went from anger to evil inspiration. She picked up her mobile and dialed some numbers as she watched Dan's entertaining dance of the Spanish flea, and she giggled with delight barely able to speak into her phone at the misery she had caused and the plans she had for him.

"... Yeah. Really serious infestation. ... OK. ... Today? ... A couple hours, then? ... Oh, I'm sure he'll still need it. See you then."

With that Kat smiled and went back inside humming happily to herself as Dan tried anything he could to stop the torture. He ran into the bushes so they scraped his hide leaving long trails of blood that just created rivers for the fleas to swim and sail in. He rubbed against a tree letting the bark grab and pluck some hair adding more suffering. He could barely think and was lucky he had dog instincts to work on this; but when he did think, it was of his distress and how he may have to put up with this as a dog forever.

This almost broke his spirit except when he heard Kat humming happily, his rage at her brought back his human resentment knowing he should never have experienced this. It was far worse than anything he had ever done to her, even that bubble gum hair incident or the permanent ink in her shower wash or the petroleum jelly in her sneakers or ... Of course, he had teased her for years, and he had been a dog for only a week. ... A week of absolute hell that definitely made up for all those years, though. But still, Dan became melancholy along with his near exhaustion and torment. He was ready to concede anything if she would just help him or make it stop.

Kat pulled a chair over and sat down having a small lunch while she watched Dan's gyrations. As much as Dan was in pain and despair, she was feeling wonderful and very happy. Dan wanted anything to stop this suffering but couldn't even pause long enough to beg Kat for forgiveness. However, his whimpers of woe clearly indicated his mind's descent to hopelessness just as it brought delight to Kat.

Kat finally got bored and went inside after about an hour. After another hour, a truck pulled up in the driveway. Dan was still pursuing relief, but Kat was out quickly to greet the three who got out of the van.

They were ...

Kat sat back in her chair to watch the festivities knowing Dan will be in absolute anguish and disappointment taking a bath with the three most unattainably gorgeous women from school. "Between the flea pain and his dog state, there's nothing he can do with them - which should extremely frustrate him." her evil thoughts filling her head causing her to smirk and quietly giggle sadistically as she watched.

Dan looked up and saw an oil-drenched beauty approaching him with arms outstretched and bending low as if offering herself to him. 1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
With the biting and itching gone, Dan was finally able to think clearly again. Seeing Kat eating one of his favorite candy bars made his mind remember more of his previous human existence. He also would really like to taste that again. All he had had for almost a week was dog food and a few scraps he had found or been given. None of it like a well grilled hamburger and fries with chocolate milkshake. Or a creamy chocolate candy bar.

Dan started to sit up and beg Kat for the bar but realized that would mean he was a dog. As a boy he would just take it. Well, as a boy before his sister could use magic on him. That reminded him that he still had to find a way to get back to being a boy.

"I guess you could get a little treat for behaving so well around those ladies while they washed you. Just standing there without getting upset or too excited." Kat said with a smirk on her face and emphasizing the last word about his lack of physical sexual desire. Then she put a piece of the chocolate bar in her hand and held it out to him.

Dan's eyes went wide as he saw the sweet treat that he so loved when he was human, and Kat was giving it to him. Dan eagerly licked it off Kat's hand and automatically swallowed without thinking.

"Doesn't even taste the same as I remember. Maybe I should have chewed it some." he thought as he looked back at Kat with big eyes and tongue out the side of his open mouth hoping she'd give him a second piece. To his surprise, she did saying, "Oh, you do look so cute as a dog." He chewed it a bit before swallowing and tried to savor the flavor as he watched Kat swing her hips as she chuckled walking into the house finishing the last of the candy.

Later that evening, Dan's guts started to feel funny. He started passing gas and finally began a series of "the runs" alternating with waves of pain through his belly. It was almost as bad as when he got the chicken flu, at least that's what his family called it as he would flap his arms to clear the way when he ran to the bathroom. Now he didn't need to flap, just get over to another part of the yard temporarily clean. But then it'd burn. Dan was really miserable.

By the time Kat brought out his dinner and a fresh bowl of water, he had squirted brown spots over most of the yard. He was just lying on the ground exhausted and wanting someone to comfort him. Mom used to hold him, and he dreamed of those times when he was a boy.

"What a mess you've made." she said as she placed the bowls down. Then she added with a smirk, "Maybe you shouldn't have eaten any chocolate."

Dan ignored her comment and just attacked the food then water as he had nothing left inside him and was very hungry. As he finished, what Kat had said dawned on him, and he got mad at her for doing that to him even though she didn't give him enough to make him so sick it might kill him. Of course that would take a whole box of candy, but he wouldn't put it past her to try, and he fumed and was going to finally let his teeth thank her. Unfortunately, his belly gurgled again, and he had to run off before he did anything else.

Kat just stood watching and smiled. Chocolate won't kill a dog unless it eats a lot - like a pound or more, but it will do worse than a laxative to its intestines. She knew what she had done was wrong and really evil, but that's what made her so happy. Revenge on Dan for the torment he had done to her for years.

As Dan shuffled slowly back to Kat, she began to take some pity on him.

"Poor, Danny. You'll be better tomorrow. And then you'll be mine. ALL mine." Kat told Dan as she went back and forth from nice to taunting. "Now remember to be good and you can be a dog forever, never have a care, and get everything done for you and food brought to you. Plus scratches behind the ears." and she bent down and scratched him as he lay in front of her.

Dan thought back at her, "Fat chance." then weakly growled that was more like a purr he was so weak, "I will find a way to get back. You'll see. I'm not a dog!" But the scratching was, oh, so, good. His hind leg and paw began to thump the ground and his mind cleared from all bad thoughts.

Kat flinched at Dan's insistence he wasn't a dog but pretended that she didn't know what he was thinking. "Oh, Danny. You poor dear. If only I could still understand you. But you're a dog now. You should try as hard as you can to act like a dog, because you'll have to do that the rest of your miserable life, groveling at my feet, following me around, sleeping at the foot of my bed when I let you, finally RESPECTING me and worshiping me as your master, and not someone to torment like you had."

Then she sighed happily. Dan thought that she must understand him since he still understood her, but maybe, ... maybe animals can understand people but just can't speak or humans understand them. Had he really reached the point that he was finally and fully a dog?

As Kat walked back to the house, Dan raised his head and weakly howled that came out more as a sad wail. He was so tired and weak from his chocolate fiasco. At least his guts had settled. The lateness, the food and the exhaustion had made him sleepy, and he just wanted to lie quietly and hope this terrible dream would be over.

Thinking Dan had made a pitiful plea to her, Kat called, "Here, boy. Come on. You can sleep at my bed again so you get used to it."

Dan slowly got up and trotted forward. His tongue was hanging out so he looked like he was smiling and happy. He was not, but he was too tired to care. He figured inside was where humans should be, and that gave him hope.

As he turned circles on the little rug at the foot of Kat's bed, he started to think maybe he should have been nicer to her. He never thought his pranks were that bad that would drive her to this. He settled down and was asleep even before Kat came back from the bathroom.

In the morning, ...

1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
You awoke to cheerful bird chirping and a warm glow coming in the window. You felt much better and recovered from yesterday as you stretched and stood up. You could see a ray of the sun transversing the room from the window to Kat's bed where it fell upon her as a golden spot light. It was as if nature was pointing out to you your perfect sister, and your insignificance compared to her. You almost sighed at this picture, but something tickled inside your nose, and you sneezed bringing you back to reality of what she had done to you.

Kat stirred a bit as you walked over to her placing your snout over the edge of the bed and looking into her face. Her face glistened in the sunbeam and mesmerized you as if she was someone special from a fairy tale. Then you wondered if you could reach the pendant that was, hopefully, back around her neck. The one that you thought gave her the power and you could use to get her to change you back to a boy.

As you inched closer, you instinctively, or rather your dog instincts, slurped your tongue around your mouth. You were so close that it also slobbered across Kat's cheek which at first scared you at what you had accidentally done and she might do to retaliate, but then the thought of dog drool on her made you feel good. She moved a little more and her eyes opened looking surprised right into yours.

"Oh, Danny." she purred with her eyes still half asleep. She reached out with her arms and put them around your neck. You momentarily thought she was about to strangle you for the wetness on her cheek, but instead she began to scratch behind your ears and rub your head gently.

It - felt - so - good ! It made you forget the medallion. It made you happy that she was happy. Even your plight of being transformed into a dog was lost somewhere back in your mind. At that moment you thought that being a dog was not so bad and maybe you really wanted to be...

"You're such a good boy, Danny. I knew you'd come round." She said as she pulled her arms back and started to get up out of bed.

"Come round to ...?" you wondered as you trotted after her hoping that she would scratch and talk sweetly to you some more. You didn't even think to try to talk or "think" to her. It was like you knew you could understand her, but she could never understand you.

It wasn't until she let you outside and you ran to do your business that your situation began to creep back in. You had almost lost it completely. Lost the one thing that you swore you'd never let happen: the fact that Kat had turned you into a dog and humiliated and tormented you when you were really her brother, a human teenage boy. You were acting just like her little doggy pet. Not even talking back to her. She was winning and you couldn't let that happen.

You stood for sometime, motionless, wide-eyed, thinking, remembering and finally barking until you realized that barking meant you were a dog. Dogs bark. Humans talk. You would tell her off when she came back and prove you were still you. Well, at least in mind.

Shortly Kat came out now dressed in her jogging attire and put a leash on you. "Time for a morning run." she said as she petted your head and started for the front gate. You wanted to hold back, and began to "tell" her so through your thoughts although her petting was distracting you. When you didn't move, she just stared at you.

"What's the matter, boy?"

"You know what the matter is you bitchy witchy bitch-witch!" you angrily projected.

"You like to run, Danny. We can't just stand here."

"Don't try to play me, Kat. I know you understand and ..."

"I don't understand what's gotten into you. Too bad you can't talk ... any more." she said and chuckled. "But you probably don't have anything to say any more do you, boy, now that you're all dog?" she ended in baby talk and rubbed your head.

"OH, NO! Have I really ... that feels so nice ... lost it? She must be pretend ..."

"LET'S GO!"

Her pull on the leash gave you a choke and you decided it would be less pain to run with her. Before she got past the gate, your mom came out and called after her. "Kat. Remember today is the day. You and Danny need to come talk to me before dinner so we can decide if you get to keep him."

"Don't worry, Mom. He was right there at bedside this morning, and we're going jogging like we'll do every day. He's all changed."

You struggled to hear and understand all the words, although you weren't clear of their meaning. It sounded like mom was going to decide whether you would stay or go. "How could she possibly even consider giving away her son?" you thought shocked by that. This was the woman who had given birth to you. You had always remembered her birthday and helped her out even if you hadn't your sister. You couldn't have been that bad of a son.

You were thinking so hard that you ignored the fact that you were jogging along side Kat down the street as if you were best buddies. Unfortunately, it wasn't like you could stop now, at least not without getting a good choking as Kat would pull the leash and your collar as she continued. "What could be worse?"

1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
As they were jogging along, Kat met up with two of Dan's best buds, Thomas and Jeremiah, who seemed to be waiting for her as they fell in and jogged along. They had never before shown any interest in her in front of Dan. In fact, they had always had disdain for Kat just like Dan, but here they were behaving very friendly and making comments about how well Dan-the-dog was trained to run with her. Not only had Kat taken over control of Dan's life, she seemed to have captured his friends.

Dan wondered what magic she had used on them until they began talking about how they liked the same things like staying fit, jogging, certain classes, career plans. They had told Dan this before, but he never connected the fact that it was the same as Kat's even though he knew all her likes as well. Suddenly Dan wondered if they were just using him to get closer to his sister. How much more humiliating could this run get?

Dan tried to speak to them but, of course, couldn't form words with his dog lips and long tongue. It sounded like he was either choking or gargling. Kat and the boys then stopped and stared at Dan.

"Maybe her needs some water or something." Tom said reacting to Dan's sputtering. "My house is down around the corner. We could go there for a little break."

Looking at his watch, Jerry said, "You two can, but I've got to get going so I'm home in time for an appointment." With that he headed off down the other street.

"So, you up for a little break, ... to get the dog some water?" Tom asked slyly smiling at Kat. Tom was a big linebacker on the ball team, quite handsome and muscular, but the same age as Dan - a few years younger than Kat. It took Kat no time to smile back coyly and say "Sure. Anything for Danny."

Kat jerked the leash for a good choke of Dan and dragged him into a trot alongside her and Tom. In five minutes they were to his house and in the kitchen, all three hot and sweaty from the run. Tom put a bowl of water on the floor. When he stood and turned around, he was right up against Kat who ran her hands up his chest and to his shoulders. He reciprocated putting his hands on her waist and pulling her against him while she locked her arms around his neck, and they kissed hard and long.

Lapping the water to cool off Dan paid no attention even as Kat asked Tom, "And what about that break?" and they hurried out of the room. Dan continued to drink until he was cool and full. Looking about he wondered where they had gone and started exploring the house. There were noises coming from upstairs, so he followed those to a room at the end of the hall.

As he got closer, his nose could smell the sweaty bodies and something else. Something that made him feel warm again but not as if he had been running. Still panting he entered and saw Kat straddling Tom on his bed, grinding away on his crotch, and naked. Tom had his hands up grasping her breasts and was moaning for her to keep it going as it was better than anything ever.

Dan froze transfixed by what he saw - his best friend being seduced by his sister, or so he thought until Tom pulled her down and rolled her over starting his own motion causing Kat to throw her head back repeating in sync with his thrusts, "Oh, my. YES. Oh, my. YES." becoming more emphatic with each one.

Then she grabbed his head and looking in Tom's eyes, she asked, "Why? Why did you never do this to me before now. WHYYYYY eeeeeey!" She let go with her hands and her voice.

Tom just arched his back and pushed harder forcing Kat to reach a higher and louder pitch. "WithOUT your BROther around we're FREEEEEEEEE!" Tom explained joining Kat in shared ecstasy.

Paralyzed by this, Dan felt stupendously stupid and thoroughly humiliated to have to watch his sister and his best friend go at it like two wild dogs in heat. It was absolutely disgusting. He tried to look away, but couldn't. As much as he was repulsed by what he saw, he just couldn't stop watching. He also found that the scene and the scent was giving him his own boner. The shock of realizing he got a hard on watching his sister have sex finally snapped him loose, and he turned and ran back downstairs.

1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
After another hour, Kat and Tom came down looking very refreshed. Kat gave Tom a peck and a wink, then took Dan's leash to lead him outside. Dan's mind was still trying to wipe the memory of Tom and Kat. He just jogged back with Kat thinking and looking at everything that went by trying to avoid thinking anything human that might trigger a recall of what he said seen and now knows.

When they got home, Kat gave Danny a good scratching of his ears and head and kept saying, "Good dog." The sensation of her rubbing felt so nice and Dan's trying to ignore human thoughts had him close to forgetting his past and almost fully comfortable with his situation. That's when he heard a voice call.

"Kat. It's time."

It was his mom, and she was headed their way. Seeing her made Dan remember himself as a boy once more. His eyes watered as he so wanted his mom to recognize and help. He tried to communicate, but all he could do was pant with his happy dog face and wag his tail.

"Dan's all ready. I think I burned any remaining humanity from him with a little encounter earlier." Kat happily exclaimed. "So. Can I keep him?"

As Kat stood with Dan on a leash by her side, she watched as her mother looked very thoroughly over the dog Dan had become. She had Kat show that Dan could do a few tricks and how he responded when Kat or she spoke to or about him.

Dan wasn't sure quite what was going on. He was finally getting the attention from his mother that he had hoped for, but not as if he was her son. It was like she was a dog expert and judging him as part of a dog show contest. He had no intention of ever going to Westminster, but there was little he could do except show his disdain when he was forced to perform. Still he tried to communicate with her through his thoughts and actions.

She inspected every part of him from nose, head, ears, to tail. Dan was really surprised and very embarrassed when she fondled his sheath and balls even massaging them until he popped out erect. He would have growled or even bit her if he wasn't taken so off-guard. It was humiliating as a teenager to have his mom coax him into a boner!

"You need to be able to do this, too." she said to Kat. "making sure he's healthy will be your responsibility."

"OO! Gross, Mom. Can't I just have the vet do that?" Kat retorted to Mom's suggestion.

"And where will you get the money for all those visits? We don't use magic for that stuff. It's only for our protection and occasional amusement." came Mom's stern reply as she grabbed Kat's hands and pulled them down to stroke and squeeze Dan enough to pop out his red wiener again.

Dan was frozen with shock and disgust, but at the same time it felt really good. Although Mom had done it very technically, Kat's smaller and softer hands had a touch that made him just about howl from the pleasure. She may not have done dogs before, but she must have had lots of experience with her boyfriends. That thought repulsed Dan even more that he could be her "love puppy."

"Very good." Mom complimented Kat but with a motherly look to question where she had learned such an expert technique.

Everyone stood quiet for several minutes. Both you and Kat stared at your mother in anticipation.

"You appear to have met all the requirements to be the master of a dog and your brother's adaptation under your control is ...

1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
"Congratulations, Kat, you've got a dog." Your mother's smile is wry and pleased.

"YES!!!" Kat punches the air and dances with joy.

"I admit, I was a little worried at first that you would be a little too eager to train him properly, but it seems Dan has adapted to his new life. I'll arrange for his human dissappearance, and buy him a good bed." She glances down at you critically, but not entirely unkindly. Kat laughs and rubs your ears.

"Oh he can keep sleeping in my bed!" she assures your mother, "I don't mind."


"Very well. Call his girlfreind over," your mother turns back to the kitchen. "If I can't spell his relationship out of her memories, I'll take care of her quietly." Kat freezes at this. Jen is carrying your puppies, unwillingly of both of you.

"Uh, why bother with her? she's not that important," your traitorous sister stammers, then grins wickedly. "We could get Danny here a friend, though!"

Your mother sighs, and shakes her head.

"Love, even young love, is very powerful Kat. It should be treated very carefully, and I believe some extra gentleness in the name of love isn't a bad thing. A witch can’t control others if she can’t control herself. Greater magics require balance, and are more about empathy than domination.” Your mother paused, then turned back to face your sister. “It’s easy to dismiss protective and supportive magic as limiting or for the weak-willed who can’t command enough power on their own, but that couldn’t be farther from the truth. Sacrifice and healing have their own rewards, Kat, and they can be greater than those of control and dominance.”

“Sure, sure, when you’re all-knowing and all-powerful some stuff gets boring after a while…” Kat grumbled and rolled her eyes. “Geez mom, you sound like a preacher…”

“Scoff all you want, darling,” your mothers eyes twinkled, “I know from personal experience that there are types of entrapment that, even if unwilling, are far from… one-sided.”

As she spoke, your mother slowly rubbed her stomach with her hand. She seemed to relish the motion, but it was not exaggerated or proud. Her small smile was not smug, but fond.

Blankly you remember seeing that look directed at you a lifetime ago, down into a cradle.

“Right, dominance isn't everything, whatever…” Kat seemed less than impressed.

“You’ll understand when you become a mother, Kat,” You mother laughed and turned away…

You calm down a little, but still pretty angry.
1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
Life for Dan had come to a standstill; turned into a pet and thrown through obediance hoops and horrifying things an animal just cannot hope to comprehend, he sat and stared for hours and hours at nothing, reflecting back on it all, staring at the wall and staring at himself.

What was there left to gain or lose? What was there left? For hours, he contemplated this single question, wanting, no NEEDING an answer; there was no way he would accept it, not before he lost his human..humanity.

Humanity.

That was the answer he was looking for; an answer that eluded him for so long, eluded Dan for so..very..long. Humanity..He would lose what made him human. Was he really such anymore? What he had done to this point, it frustrated him; he could do nothing while his sister could do everything. He hated himself, but he hated her more; and his hate started to grow; at first, his sister came down to gloat, mocking him. Telling him 'what a good pet' he'll make, and how his friends didn't matter anymore; how he was finally alone, and soon to be just an insuffrable animal, with nothing human left in him.

At first, he lowered his head and whimpered, looking at the wall; it was the one thing that kept him holding onto his humanity. His mother knew about his sister's powers; his mother may even have them. And she didn't care. None of them did. They wanted nothing to do with him, and his own girlfriend..what he did to her..

An animal could not comprehend it, normally; however, the clarity was pure in his mind here and now. His hatred for them just as pure as his clairty; letting out a low growl, he stood up from the place he was and turned towards his sister, growling even more.

"Hmph.." She started. "What're you going to do? I've got the power; I control you! You're my pet, always and forever! Just accept it, you little shit! Accept it like the little bitch you are! Hey, maybe I'll even allow you a visitor from time to time? It's not like your friends are there for you, anymore," she grinned, "so maybe a cute little bitch, or a big burly alpha will cool your jets, huh? You'd like that, wouldn't you? I bet you want to be fucked by an alpha..."

Dan snarled in response, but she seemed far less fazed by it than most dog owners would be. Dan's mother came into the room and sighed, shaking her head. "Don't worry, sweetie.." She spoke to her daughter, "he'll calm down in a couple of hours, I'm sure. He can be so stubborn, but most pets are..The magic will work just fine. But remember," she cautioned, "I told you how dominance isn't everything, because it isn't. If you don't care for him legitimately and just want ot use it for dominance, well, that..never turns out well."

"Yeah, whatever Mom.." She scoffed; she knew she dominated you now, and she knew it well. Her defying smirk gave it away. What no one knew, however, was the boiling, searing rage boiling in the pit of your stomach, and the snarls grew only louder. Digging your claws deep into the carpet, your eyes closed for a moment; you remembered all the hurt and pain you were put through, all of the obedience courses, what you did to your girlfriend..what Tom did to Kate, and the hatred you felt knowing the friend you thought existed, had never existed at all.

Dan was alone. He was scared; scared of being like this forever, scared of being unable to eat food or understand love, or know what it is like to be in love. And it was all your sister's fault; her and your mother. This thought slowly drove you insane, and over the edge, your rage and anger and pure, unfiltered anger beginning to really surface. Your mother looked back in your direction, and she seemed a bit concerned.

"Maybe you should put him outside for a bit, sweetie..he's starting to look a little bit, well...angry. And you know how angry some pets can be..." She warned, her face showing concern and a little bit of worry. Your sister looked at her and shrugged. "Fine, I guess you're right...." She grumbled and slowly walked over to you, reaching for you to take you outside, and calm down as it were.

choices: All is not what it seems.
Dan really is back..but with a twist.
1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
As soon as Kat touched Dan, she was shocked to feel a sudden surge of pain jolt through her hand and she pulled away rapidly. "What the fuck?" She said aloud, shaking her hand; she found she could no longer move the joints properly; it had felt like a jolt of electricity and fire had burst through the joints and rendered them immobile.

She tried to shake it off, and whined a little at the pain. "You little brat. I'll show you who's the boss around here.." She glared at you, and when you still didn't open your eyes grew even angrier. "Open your eyes, you little shit! You're my pet, and I demand.."

Magic: it was a beautiful and chaotic thing. Beautiful, for all the wonders it creates, just as for all the creatures it can bring forth, and chaotic for all the pain it can cause, the destruction it can bring, the pain and suffering it can cause. Something unexplainable and unusally unusable by anyone except for females, reportedly; specific females. There were likely several cases of this happening in other families; where mothers and daughters turn their uncooperative brothers into pet animals, for their amusement. Today was going to be different; instead, though, it was likely they hadn't gone through what Dan had. Losing his friends; losing his girlfriend, and what he did to her; losing every semblance of humanity he had, and forced to hear himself degrade and slowly die. But it was here now; the psalm of his soul; the hymn of his humanity, and the breath of his life, forced into all these things and more.

And now, instead of binding you to this form, it was resonating with your pure unfiltered hatred, anger and rage; it was chaotic, combining and reacting, swirling in a chaos of beauty and chaos. You could see it happening within your own mind's eye, and see the swirls, the beauty, and the rage and anger filling and filling it up; Dan tuned the world out as this all happened, but kept his ears open to what Kat said, as well as his mother.

"Mom..What the fuck do I do? I can't fucking touch him, and look what he did to my hand!" She whimpered, glaring at you and showing her hand to her mother. Her mother looked increasingly concerned and could only shake her head in response. "I'm sorry, sweetie but..I don't know what to tell you; I don't know what's happening. I..I never encountered this before.." She gulped. Your sister glared at her, too and huffed. "Bullshit!" she shouted, "you taught me everything you knew! And you don't know what's going on?! How?!"

Dan's mother gulped, shaking her head. "Well..you remember how I told you about dominance and that too much of it can drive an animal over, and how I..well, told you too much was a bad thing?" She paused, looking at Dan and back at Kat. "Well..magic is unpredictable, and..it may actually feed your brother. And the more he's fed..well, they said it was possible, and I was taught that, if I were to ever subject anyone to this that it had to be of their consent..and to never treat them as if I dominated them..." She nodded, still in thought. "S-so I never did.."

Kat shook her head at her mother. "Feeding Dan? The hell do you mean by that?!"

"Calm down, sweetie," her mother encouraged, "it shouldn't be but for awhile. At least..that's what I was told..."


It wasn't as Dan's mother reassured, even if Kat was acting impatient and still shaking her hand from the injury, you weren't calming down and your mother backed away. "Kat, honey, sweetie...you..you might want to turn Dan back.."

Kat looked incredulous at that and shook her head. "Why should I?! He's the family pet now! He should treat me with respect! I'll teach him, I'll..." She stopped dead in her tracks as her eyes caught hold of Dan again.

Expanding outwards, the magic seemed to alight the room a pure color; the purity of rage, a combination of orange surrounding red. As soon as it expanded outwards, it imploded, causing a loud CRACK to echo throughout the neighborhood, an audible crack heard to most people as if a car had crashed, or a truck had tipped over. Dan's mother knew better, though; it was the only warning she and her daughter would get before Dan was realized.

"Kat...We need to get out of here..." She spoke, quickly moving to get out of the vicinity; Kat shook her head at her mother, in puzzlement. "But why..?"

"Don't argue with me, dammit, Dan..Dan's changing. And if we don't get out of here..."

It was too late; as Dan's eyes finally opened, he stood up as an animal on two legs at first, but grew to match his old height. The fur and claws and fangs retracted, and it was as if he was back to his old self..at least it seemed so for now.

Dan leaves, and thinks he should go on a little roadtrip to the Academy.
1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
"Oh great, " Kat muttered, "I'm going to have to retrain him..again. Well isn't that fine?!" She shouted, marching over to Dan. Her mother tried to stop her, grabbing at her shoulder, Kat quickly moved away. "Don't try to stop me Mom! This time I'll be sure to do a damn better job...." She didn't seem fearful enough even as she got near, grumbling. She remembered the incantation and spell properly, and started to cast it as normal; when she was finished, though..

Dan hadn't changed.

"What the hell?" She said, and as she started to cast it again, Dan reached out and gripped both her wrists painfully; the same feeling as before gripped her, only it went through her whole body and she started to scream. "W-what's happening..?!" Her mother backed away, and sighed, shaking her head.

"I can't believe it..." She murmured. "This happened once before, in the Academy.." She shook her head, staring. "But to happen here and now..?" She looked forward, and gulped, nodding to herself. "Kat..."

"Let go of my hands you fucking...OW! Why is this hurting me so goddamn much?!" She yelled, screaming a little as her hands felt like they were on fire.

"Sweetie..Dan isn't..isn't suspeptible to magic anymore.." She gulped, "and his touch...well.." Dan's mother rubbed her temple back and forth, shaking her head. "Dan has been turned into a nexus of anti-magic, sweetie."

"What?! What the fuck are..FUCK! OW!" She screeched as Dan's grip got tighter.

"Mom's right.." Dan said, looking deep into his Sister's eyes. "Hey Sis..what's up?" He grinned, gripping ever so tighter on her wrists, and lifted her up in the air with relative ease.

"You see, sis, all that magic you poured into me...Making me what I was..? All of what you did to me..." He spat. "And everything I heard..Well, it made angry. Angrier than anything you've ever quite known. Animals don't know what happens when you're forced to rape your girlfriend, or the concept of humanity, sometimes they can't even comprehend cruelty. They're supposed to trust you, after all. Supposed to feel love, or hatred, maybe ambivalence, but pain? They don't expect it from someone they trust..." He glared at her, and spat in her face.

"Why you little..."


"I'm not so little anymore. Oh, and I hope you liked your little time with Tom; he's going to love it when you show up tomorrow.." Dan could only grin widely, especially at Kat's widened eyes. Dan's mother looked at Kat in surprise.

"Kat..did you really do all of that...?" She spoke aloud. When Kat didn't answer, Dan did.

"Yes..Yes she did. And you enabled her; you even gave her blessings for making me the 'pet.'" Dan glared at his mother, but shrugged. "Guess what I can do, Kat?" He taunted, swinging her back and forth from his grip and causing her much more pain.

"Ow! Fuck! W-what? What the fuck do you think you can do?"


Gripping tightly, he grinned at her, and focused a little bit of his powers into her; this sent shockwaves of pain and hurt, and when Dan finally let her go she stared at him, slightly afraid. "W-what did you do?!"

"Me? Oh nothing. Just..altered a little something in your life. Well, to be fair, I just took your magic powers for me own," Dan started, "and now I'm going to use them to alter a little something something up for you, alright? Both of you." He grinned, rubbed his hands together and combined both his anti-magic and magic by rubbing his hands together, causing negative magic energy and positive magic energy to form into one, then clapped his hands together twice.

When nothing immediately happened, Kat grinned at him. "Hah, you can't use magic..Boys don't have it! You might have 'anti-magic' but you'll never..." She stopped dead sentence, and felt herself slowly kneeling down at his feet, just as his mother was. When she tried to say anything, it came out as nothing.

"You see, I altered reality a little bit; since you fucked up my life and made me go through what I went through, I figure 'hey, why not return the favor'? So, here's the deal. Tom doesn't like you anymore; in fact, he thinks you took advantage of him, and wants to get back at you for that. This is where all this.." He waved his hands a bit, "..comes in. He can do whatever he wants to you. And Mom will be forced to watch, just like you forced me to do what I did. Just like you forced me into this. I don't know what Tom wants..but I do know something you don't."

Dan smiled at her inability to scream, or to talk. "I know the list of every boy you hate. And they're all going to come over and have nice fun with you. They don't know you're unwilling; just that you're alone, horny as hell, and want a nice fuck. And hey, maybe if you're good and treat them nice, I'll let you go." Dan smirked, but nodded to his Mother; immediately, she was released from the spell he placed, and he slowly walked out. "I'm actually glad you did this to me, Sis. And you.." He nodded to his mother. "You taught me how much my family means shit to me, and how much I should care. Keyword: None." He grinned. "Birthed me, and threw me to the curb.." He spun around to face her one last time.

Clapping his hands, he chanted a quick spell. "Tell Dad what you did, what my sister did, down to the letter; I'll show you in your head what all she did, and then tell Dad I will never return." As soon as he clapped and finished the spell, his mother's head filled rapidly with thoughts, and images and Dan's feelings, and emotions. Overwhelmed, she fell to the floor and gasped, almost vomitting.

"Goodbye."
1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.title: The Wheel keeps spinnin' around and 'round again..

1111111111112212221211212211212112122121.content:
There is a reason why Kat was only allowed seven days to erase Dan's humanity. Human and animal psyche are very different. Animals are creatures of instinct and reaction; they do not have the capacity to reason or plan. Humans have more capacity for reason, and can therefore understand more than an animal.

An animal could not experience the amount and magnitude of pain that Dan had over the last seven days. An animal can feel the pain of being raped and humiliated, an animal can feel fear and despair, but an animal cannot understand a human reasons for pain.

An animal cannot feel the pain of a failed plan because they cannot plan. An animal cannot feel the fear of loosing your identity because they have no identity to lose. An animal cannot feel horror of raping your own girlfriend as she begs you to stop because they do not know all the pain of what the word means. An animal cannot feel all the pain of seven days of hell rushing back all at once because they can't remember that much time clearly.

An animal cannot comprehend the concept of hate. Hate is a human thing.

A human cannot fall back on the ancestral instincts of generations of predators, which are actually much less dangerous than the concept of hate.
After all, a wolf only kills to eat something.

This was intolerable. Dan had been a good boy, he'd done well in school and, as Kate herself said, he was caring. Now he was going to spend the rest of his life as cow because she resented him? She said he picked on her but he had no memory of that, he didn't get her presents, but she didn't get him presents, it was an unspoken agreement.

She was rubbing it in too, waving the wand in front of him discussing what she might do with him. No, what she was going to do to her. Dan wasn't a he anymore. That was something she would have to get used to considering her sister was talking about impregnating her.

God! What had he done to deserve this? He hadn't been the best big brother but ... wait a minute, when he came home he thought he was her little brother. Since she called him big brother he remembered that he was the older sibling, but that morning he was convinced he was a sixteen year old. She must have used magic on him before he even stepped through the door. That bitch!

If Dan was her big brother that meant- Dan grabbed the wand in her mouth. "You shouldn't have reminded me I'm your big brother," she thought.

Kate was not happy, "Give that back, right now," she ordered.

"You're not in a position to make demands, wandless wonder," Dan thought. She was already making preparations, and clearing her mind of Kat's influence. She was glad that the first thing she had done was disable that infernal collar, otherwise she'd have been compelled to give the wand back.

"Give it back or I'll."

"Or you'll what, _Kat_?"

"Don't call me that! I hate that name."

"I know. Why else would you make me think of you as 'Kate'?"

Kat was through talking, she was going to walk over there, grab the wand, and turn Dan into a slime mold. Something that could never grab her wand. It seemed like a good plan until she found that her feet couldn't move.

"That's not nice, Kat. You've been much meaner to me than I ever was to you, and I'm not going to change you into a slime mold. You're going to stay right there."

"No! You can't do that! You're not-"

"Not what? Not a female member of the family over the age of 18? I think you're well aware of just how female I am. You stuck your hand in." Dan rapidly changed into a 19 year old human girl. She was attractive, but her clothing was conservative. Dan poked one of her breasts, and liked the feel of it. She could certainly live like this.

"Now," Dan said, and then paused a moment. She felt her throat and smiled. "It's nice to be able to speak again. Now, your first mistake was being an ass. If you thought I wasn't doing my job as big brother you could have said something. Instead you made me think I was your little brother. What was the point in that, by the way?” Kat just glared at her. "Your second mistake was turning me into a cow. You could have turned me into anything, but you turned me female. That made me into a witch too. Your third mistake was not ordering me to leave your wand alone. Your final mistake was reminding me I was your big brother. Until you said that I thought I was sixteen, two years away from being a witch.

"So this is what's going to happen. I've made it so you can't change me, in body or mind. You can't try to trick me, you can't try to hurt me, you can't make anyone else do any of those things. You can't even suggest such a thing or take any action that you think will lead to such a thing. You can't move against me in any way. I might of thought these measures were excessive were it not for the fact you were discussing having me raped by a bull.

"As you've noticed, you can't move your feet. You just stand there while I get mom and dad. I'll let them decide what to do with you."

Dan noticed that as soon as she left the room she couldn't hear Kat's constant stream of threats and profanity. It dawned on her that Kat had soundproofed the house, that was why their parents hadn't heard her mooing. It didn't take long for her to find her parents, they were in the living room watching Hogan's Heroes.

When Dan walked in her parents didn't recognize her. They did recognize the wand, but that made them jump to the wrong conclusion. "Kat?" her mother asked.

"No, Dan," she answered.

Your mother stood upright in a bolt, "Did Kat do this to you?"

"No, Kat turned me into a cow. Actually she made me think I was younger than her, then she turned me into a cow. Then she," Dan stopped as the reality of what Kat had done was starting to sink in for the first time. She took a moment and then continued, "molested me and," she was forced to stop again. She had felt anger before, outrage even, but the abject horror of what Kat was doing only now became apparent to her. "she said she was going to turn one of my friends into a bull and ... and," Dan started crying. She had narrowly escaped being raped and that was simply too much to take.

Her mother put her arms around her and shushed her, "It's ok now." After a while Dan stopped crying, the tears has been cathartic and she was again able to face what had happened. Her mother seemed to sense this, and asked, "How did you get away?"

"She put a collar on me that made it so I had to obey her," Dan's mother quickly glanced at Dan's father, "but she never said I couldn't take the wand, so I grabbed it. I realized that when she made me female she made me into witch too, so I made it so I didn't have to obey her, and turned myself human."

"On your own?" Dan's mother asked.

"No, with the wand."

"What I meant was, you didn't use a spellbook?"

"Spellbook?" 'Was that what Kat had been reading?' Dan wondered, then she noticed how much her mother's eyes had widened, "Is something wrong? I didn't use any book, is that bad?"

"No, it's good. It means you're a natural witch."

"What does that mean?" Dan asked.

"It doesn't necessarily mean anything. If you don't study, don't practice, or don't put in an effort then it means nothing. But if you do," she paused and looked directly into Dan's eyes, "if you study, if you practice and if you put in honest effort then you will be a better witch than any ordinary witch could ever be."

Dan thought about that, earlier in the day she didn't believe witches existed, and was male anyway, then she had to face the prospect of life as a cow, now she was being told that she could become the most powerful kind of witch. "What does a witch do?"

"Whatever she wants," Dan's mother said.

I track down malicious magical devices, like the collar your sister put on you, collect them together and destroy them." She stopped, it looked like her eyes were about to tear up. "I never thought Kat would do something like that. I'm so sorry."

"It's ok," Dan told her, "It wasn't your fault and I'm fine now."

The door of his bedroom opened. Kat came in.

he reached for his hat he had lying next to his clothes. "Good thing I brought this, otherwise I would be down for the count."

Dan still knew who he was, with no thoughts to fit his form just yet. However, he did not even think about complaining about his current situation as Kat would probably just make it worse for him. His only option, at this very moment, was to play along. Deeply blushing beneath his thin golden face fur, he cautiously took a few steps outside the dressing room, in full view of all the people there. His mother looked as if nothing was up, and just remarked how good the pants looked on him. Was she playing along too or just manipulated by Kat? Or perhaps she was even the initiator of this whole plan? His mother paid for the pants and they went home, Dan finding it very hard not to say anything. Back in the car on the way home, he uncomfortably looked at the length of his tail shuffling and occasionally thumping against the rest of the back seat next to him.

When they got home, they went inside and mom gestured for Kat and Dan to sit down. "Katherine", she said, "you've always expressed a strong desire to have a pet but I'm doubting your readiness to handle such things. Later on, perhaps even in a few years already, you'll be facing this task for real so you had better know what you're doing. As such, I've allowed you to practice with your brother...", she glanced at Dan, "...you may customize him as you wish, just keep him well cared for. I grant you parental authority over him, and should you have any problems, just come to me. I'm sure I'll be able to help."

Dan had been listening with pounding heart and couldn't believe what he was hearing. He was supposed to obey this witch? He let out a whining "Mommmm..." to voice his displeasure, which briefly revealed his cub fangs, to which Kat simply answered:"Yes, what is it?"

He was in worse shape than he had thought if she actually had authority over him.

1213321.content:
Dan just sat on his bed for a few moments, too shocked to do anything else. "I guess she wasn't kidding," he thought, "She really is a witch. And I guess I get to be her new plaything," he thought glumly. "Really, turning her own brother into an animal? That's sick! Telling me all about how my humanity's going to slip away, piece by piece..." He shook his head, new ears moving from side-to-side as he did. "When Mom and Dad find out..." But he trailed off. Deep down, he knew his parents wouldn't really do anything. Kat could act dumb, but she was smart enough not to do something that would get her in serious trouble.

Best case scenario, they were appalled at what had happened, but Kat convinced them she hadn't meant to, and was still getting used to her powers. He would be turned back to normal, but she'd be fine, and she'd likely do more to him whenever she wanted, with another "accident." Then there was the worst case scenario: like she said, Mom and Dad would be fine with it. He shivered as he considered that they might be fine with their son living the rest of his life as an animal. It seemed crazy, but so did the idea of magic, about which, as he gave his new ears a poke and winced at the twitch they gave, he could no longer be skeptical But he had enough faith in his parents to think they wouldn't leave him like that. Still, family dynamics might not be so fun. He thought about fantasy stories, where the magic-users sometimes turn into the upper class, with freedom to do whatever they like to the powerless commoners. He'd always thought his sister was the favorite, and it might be practically official, now. She might be allowed to do whatever she liked to him, as long as she didn't kill him. Considering how power-mad she seemed to get when allowed to babysit, he trembled at what she'd do with actual magic.

Realizing how his life might soon suck beyond his wildest dreams, Dan got rather pissed off. "It's not fair! I've always been a good, hard-working person, and she's been a lazy bitch, so how come she gets magic? If I could do half of what she can, I wouldn't have said, 'Animal time for Kat!' right off the bat!" It spoke to his honesty that Dan didn't claim he would NEVER consider transforming his sister. "I'd do something good for the world! I mean, what right does she have?" But he knew all too well what right she had: that of the strong over the weak. A right he would become intimately familiar with if he was truly joining the animal kingdom. The realization numbed his rage. There wasn't really anything he could do, at the moment, so he decided he should pass the time guessing at what he was turning into.

No other animal features had sprouted in the last few minutes, so Dan started with the ears. He ran his fingertips along his ears from the base up. After at least six inches of furry length, he finally reached their pointy tips. "Hmm, what animal has long, pointed ears?" There were plenty of others, but there was one that came to mind. "I might be turning into a rabbit." He frowned. "That would be kinda lame. I was hoping I'd at least be a predator, not a little bunny." He sighed. He then remembered Kat had said the animal would reflect his inner self. "... So, what does a rabbit mean?" He then remembered The Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past, and chuckled a little, despite himself. "That's right, stepping into the Dark World turned people into their true forms, and Link turned into a bunny man. ... Heh, I guess it would be something if a rabbit means I'm heroic." He was still scared of the whole situation, but he felt better that he was at least able to laugh at it.

"Well, Link turned into a pink bunny, so I guess I should get a look at the color. And it couldn't hurt to get used to seeing myself with them, I guess." With some hesitation, Dan hopped off his bed and walked to a mirror that had come with his room. He looked at himself, finding his image very odd with those alien things on his head. He scratched at one of them, and watched it twitch in the mirror. "Hmm, gray. Link's fur was the color of his hair, so I thought they might be brown. Come to think of it, pink was one hell of a weird..." He trailed off as he realized something. The only animal he'd thought of was a rabbit. But, now that he saw himself with long, gray, pointed ears, he finally caught up
"... Oh, no."

Over the past few hours, he had thought about animals he'd be alright with, and creatures he would hate to become. The present consideration was squarely in the second camp. "A donkey!?" He felt, as he saw in the mirror, his ears flatten against his skull, an alien feeling that only set his heart pumping even faster. "No, no that's not it. It's not. Yeah, I think they really do look like rabbit ears. Yeah." He didn't know enough about animals to tell just from appearance, so his words rang hollow. Dan truly did not want to become a beast of burden spoken of in fables for its stupidity and stubbornness. Kat's words about the creature representing his true nature would be the twist of the knife. Particularly since he had far too easy a time coming up with ways a jackass suited his personality. Whether this resulted from personal honesty or an inferiority complex didn't much matter to him.

So, Dan stood there for a time, staring and prodding at his new ears, and whispering, "C'mon bunny, bunny, bunny..." Part of him wanted another change to answer the question of what he was becoming. But he mostly wanted to hang onto his humanity as long as he could. Regardless, he wondered when the next change would come, and what it would be.

And indeed she had promised her to support her in every way, Lifestock owner was a strange thing. But at least she would learn some responsibility with this animal.

"We simply use the stable that is already there" Kat pointed to a little 1 animal stable in the corner of the yard. It had been there when her family had moved into this house. Kat knew exactly was she was doing, She knew the weak spots of her mother.

Dan was starting to feel darker and more grim. Maybe if he would run over her sister he could stop the spell. He pulled his right-hind leg up, but he found he could not move any further. He looked at this sister. Kat only trying to palm their mother.

"Well sweety, If this will help you with you future job, and learn you responsibility, we might. I have to ask you're father and brother though." Mother said with a smiling face. "Speaking of which, where is youre brother Dan? The heifer let out a soft Mooo.

"Make sure you take good care of her, it would be best if you would also let a vet come to check her." That was her final word, then she was gone.

Kat let out a loud Laugh "HaHaHa and how was that show brother dear?"
I told you, I only need a good story.

12211111.content:
"Oh, Kat, you're so lucky," gushed a voice Dan recognized as belonging to Kat's friend Emily. "To think you have your own milk cow. Those hot milk baths do wonder for the skin."

Dan rolled his eyes, as he heard the girls chatting as they approached. From the snippets of conversation, he quickly surmised that they were coming down to milk him.

"Well, here's Dan," Kat said opening the barn door.

"Uh, you mean Danielle, right? Dan's a boy's name," said Ginger. She was constantly goading Kat, and considering Kat's new powers, Dan was surprised that she hadn't transformed Ginger.

"Actually, I call it Dan to annoy my kid brother," Kat explained cheerily.

"Oh, speaking of Danny, where is the cute boy," Marta asked.

Kat was slightly caught off guards, but she answered, "Well, it is my birthday, and the little troll was having a cow, so he's not going to show his ugly little face around here today."

"Oh, too bad," murmured Marta.

"Say, speaking of having cows," Emily said trying to change the subject since she could see Kat was upset, "Do you plan to breed your cow?"

Kat's face lit up, "What a splendid idea! In a few years, I could have my own dairy farm, I guess all I need is a bull."

Marta wandered over and was petting Dan. She pulled a blue ribbon out of her hair and tied it to Dan's tail. She said softly, "I bet you'd like a big strong bull to make you a mother, Dan."

"Yes!" said Kat with maniacal glee.

"Oh, come on, if you want to watch animals hump, we can turn on the Discovery Channel or Animal Planet or PBS," said Ginger, "It smells in here. Let's go back to the house."

"Well, I did want you all to see our new family cow. Here's a bucket, Ginger, why don't you go first!"

"Go first?"

"Yes, we're going to have a time milking contest. We'll each take 30 second turns milking the cow. The one who gets the most milk in that time wins."

"You're kidding?"

"No, and you're first," Kat said opening the half gate to the stall and sliding a small stool next to Dan.

Ginger sat down her cold icy fingernails dug into Dan's udder and he lowed in pain. She moved her fingers and managed to get 3-4 squirts in her bucket before Kat yelled time. Each girl was given a plastic bucket and each collected several ounces of creamy milk from Dan's udder. He was horrified as the girl's squeezed the "cow juice" out of him. Marta had the warmest gentlest hands and see managed to nearly fill her little bucket in the time alloted. Marta was declared the winner, and the girls carried their buckets of Dan's milk up to the house, where they'd whip it into whip cream- Ginger corrected Kat again, "You mean creme fresh!"

While the girls were hard at work with their whisks, the door bell rang. Kat raced to the door thinking it must be a special gift. She looked up into the school's star receiver's eyes. She licked her lips, he was a senior, and she didn't think he even knew she was alive.

"Hello, Kurt, thank you for coming to my party," Kat gushed.

"Your party? Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't mean to interrupt. I'm here to see your brother Dan, he's tutoring me in math," he said with a silly grin, which said yeah, a freshman is tutoring a senior in math.

"Well, Dan's not here right now. Perhaps you'd like to join my party?"

"Oh, thanks, but no thanks. Dan told me to be here now so I'm sure he'll be back soon. I'll just sit here on the front step and wait."

"Really, Kurt, you could at least wish me a happy birthday," Kat said in disgust.

"Sure, happy birthday, uh, Dan's sister," Kurt said. He didn't know her name.

Kat rolled her eyes. Then she smiled as an evil thought crossed her mind. She noticed the bulge in Kurt's jeans. He was sort of built like a bull, and she did want to teach Dan a lesson. She was far from done toying with Dan.

"Wait, Kurt, what am I thinking, Dan won't be coming back here. He's down at our barn. Just go around the house and follow the path to the barn. You should find him in the stall down there," Kat said pointing the way.

"You could've said that right away," complained Kurt picking up his back pack and heading down the path by the side of the house.

He didn't see Kat raise her hand and make an odd gesture at his back.

1222.content:
"I'll be a horse," Dan said.

"You're kidding me," Kat replied.

"No seriously. Go ahead turn me into a horse!" Dan said.

"Well, the lack of originality doesn’t surprise me. Whatever Dan, I hope you like oats and hay because that's all you'll be eating from now on!"

Dan shook his head. Kat really believed that she could turn him into an animal. He was ready to laugh at her foolishness and arrogance.

Kat's wand glowed and Dan felt a sudden sharp pain in his stomach. Both Dan and Kat were about to learn lessons. Dan would soon learn the value of never underestimating anyone. Kat would learn why one should never abuse their power.

Clutching his stomach, Dan cringed. "What did you do? Did you poison me or something?" he asked.

"No, I gave you exactly what you ask for," Kat said.

Dan looked at his arms and saw brown hairs growing everywhere. His hands were becoming numb and inflexible. "No!" Dan yelled.

"Don't you mean, neigh?" Kat laughed.

Dan grabbed at Kat's shirt only for his grip to loosen as all but his middle fingers retreated into his hands.

"Please, stop this!" Dan cried.

Dan’s arms quivered as thick nails grew around his fattening middle fingers. His hands were becoming hooves and there seemed nothing he could do about it. His arms were now almost covered in brown fur.

Kat noted the change in Dan’s voice. “You sound a little hoarse Dan. I wonder why?”

“I don’t want this!” Dan cried as he looked at his arms, which were now the forelegs of a horse.

"Why? You'll make a fine stallion. Think of it Dan, no school or work. Sure you'll smell a little, (not that that's any different from now). You'll also be strong and virile.”

Dan felt a surge of excitment at Kat’s last statement. He tried to push it out but the thoughts of the beast he was becoming were already making themselves at home in his mind.

Kat smiled and cast another spell, making Dan’s clothes vanish.

“There, that’ll make things easier for you. I’d prefer not to see you naked but a naked horse is hardly a problem. We’ll solve that one soon enough won’t we Dan?” Kat said.

Dan self a surge of pain all over his chest as well as a prickling above his rear end. His chest was starting to barrel out and his muscles were developing. Brown hair was sprouting all over his torso. Dan could feel his tail growing as well as the itch of his growing mane.

Kat took several steps back and grinned. “Coming along well Dan.”

“Please Kat, stop this. I’ll do anything!” Dan pleaded.

Dan’s mind however, was saying different. The thoughts and desires of the stallion were screaming at him, telling him that refusing this gift would be an insult. Being human would mean giving up on much more enjoyable desires. Dan felt something between his legs getting heavier. It wasn’t his growing tail. There was only one thing it could be.

Seconds before Dan’s expanding chest forced him onto all fours he’d looked down at what was anything but human equipment.

“That’s right Dan, let it take you. I’ve always wanted a horsie, now you can be him. Why worry of decency? Now you can be yourself!” Kat laughed.

Dan felt his feet starting the process of changing into hooves as his legs became furred and his hips changed. At first, Dan thought the room was getting smaller. He didn’t need long to realise it was he that was growing. Sadly, this would be amoung the last of Dan's human thoughts.

Now Dan’s face began to hurt. What was among the last of his humanity was slipping away.

“I don’t want to be a horse! I’m a guy not some farm animal!” Dan protested.

Dan’s mind screamed at him otherwise. His strength was becoming apparent to him. With such a body there was little he could besides sleep, eat, carry heavy loads and do the one act that farm animals were best known for. While Dan tried to deny it, a part of him enjoyed the prospect of that. In fact, his smiled with thickening teeth. He enjoyed how strong he felt. He could lift and carry just about anything now.

“That’s it Dan, be the beast you are!” Kat said.

Dan didn’t respond. He couldn’t even if he wanted to, as by now, his face was that of a horse. Besides, Kat’s words meant little to him now.

His tail swishing, Dan was eager to try out his new body. A smaller force in him demanded he resist this. However desire was much more powerful now. Resisting his impulses was all but impossible; any human inhibition was gone.

With a flick of her wand, Kat sent Dan to a nearby farm, making sure that her magic also had anyone there fail to find the sudden appearance of a young stallion unusual. As far as they knew, Dan was a gift that someone had just delivered.

Kat heard her mother approach her room.

“What was all that noise?”

“Oh nothing, Dan was just horsing around,” Kat said with an evil grin
