134111111.content:
Kat gently untangled Dan from the door, lifted his pot, and took him in the bathroom. There she put water in his pot, and brought him back to her room. The water soaked into Dan's roots, filling him with life and energy. But not energy that Dan would expect. Instead of wanting to move around and do things, all he seemed to want to do was sit there and find the sun. He extended his stalk towards the window as much as he could until Kat opened the window, and he felt sunlight stream in. He loved it, and he just basked in the glow of the feeling for what seemed like hours. He was a plant, there was no need for movement. Before he realized it Kat had been gone, and was doing other normal things, but Dan just sat there, content to soak in the sun's rays until the sun finally set. He sighed when it was dark, but there seemed the be not much else to do. He could barely move, and he didn't really feel like he wanted to even if he could. Se he just sat there. Kat came back into her room, and flipped the light as she went to sleep.

The next morning, Kat watered Dan before she left to go into town. Dan was left at the house, alone, just to watch as the sun rose and fell from Kat's upstairs window. But somehow he felt content to stay that way. And it only seemed like an hour, and Kat was back, watering him again, and turning off the light to go to sleep.

Dan's days went fairly quickly, his mind seeming to perceive time much differently. His mentality changed as well. He no longer felt bored. His thoughts drifted to what Kat had done, but he couldn't feel mad at her. In fact, he felt grateful to her for allowing him to live on her desk, and to have sunlight and water. He was only really aware of the world when someone came back into Kat's room. And then they would never talk to him. They treated him as the plant that he was.

It was about a month later that Kat picked Dan's pot up. He had grown considerably, and if he was going to grow anymore, he needed to be planted in the ground.
"You ready to be planted outside?" Kat asked. It took all of Dan's willpower to finally comprehend that she was talking to him, and then move at all in order to respond.
"Y-yes..." was all he could muster, being the first words he'd spoken in a month. It felt foreign to him for him to be able to move, let alone talk. As she carried him, he tried to move more, and he succeeded in small movements, but it seemed so unnatural.
In the yard, Kat dug a hole in the ground, and finally began to take Dan out of his pot. His human mind knew what she was doing, but somehow his sluggish thoughts couldn't comprehend that this was good for him. He freaked out.
"N-no....stop..." were the two words to come to mind.
"You'll be fine," Kat said. "This'll be good for you." She gently placed his roots in the ground. For a moment, Dan felt like he was naked, his roots being exposed to the cold air. But she quickly put them in the ground, and burred them with nice, moist dirt. She watered him, and left him in the sun. This time he could watch as the sun went all the way up and all the way down as his vision was not blocked by anything.

As the weeks went on, he felt himself grow. He no longer followed the sun, and only stared east, always waiting for the sun to come up. Days seemed to simply go by as he sat there. He never payed attention to his family. He hardly regarded them as family any more, the only one he knew being the nice girl who came and watered him every day. It had been almost six months, when spring time came, that the girl came and bushed his face with her hands.
"Hmmm," she said. "You're moth and eyes are gone. That's strange." Dan had no idea what she was talking about. He had no eyes, he was a flower. His memory of a life before had faded, and he thought of himself as nothing else. He had lost all power of movement, if he wanted to that is.

He stayed in the yard till a full year had passed. He had grown well over seven feet tall, but he could feel his time coming. He began to face the earth as his flower withered, and his seeds fell to the earth. His life was over, he felt.
134111111.title: Kate watered plant.

1341111111.content:
Kat's mother, Catra, watched her daughter with apprehension. She had told her daughter to take care of Dan, as a part of her test. She had told her son, Dan, that her role as a witch came before her role as a mother. This was true, yet it filled her with conflict.

For Catra was not of this earthly world. She had walked, ageless, in far flung cosmic realms; places of sensation and thought where the rules of the physical world simply did not exist. There, one drew strength from love and compassion. Wickedness made one weak, and hatred made one wither and die. Evil actions were dealt with swiftly and without mercy by Powers beyond.

Catra had met a young human male while passing through this physical plane one day, and the two had fallen in love. Catra knew when she started a family in this human realm that she would be straddling a line between her loyalty to her ancient order and the needs of her human children. Seeing her children fight while growing up didn't concern Catra much. Many human children fought; it had been her observation of this race. But Kat had a dark streak to her that Catra had become aware of as of late.

Being of an extra-planar race herself, Kat was subject to their laws, though she knew herself only to be a "witch". Kat was still far too young to receive of her heritage beyond that fact, plus certain magical teachings, which were traditional for females. Catra had instructed her daughter to show respect for life, nature, and cosmic balance. She had taught the same to her son, but had to leave out the magic per the laws and traditions of her realm.

However, Kat had always displayed a dark streak. For every flower she helped to grow, she would suck the air out from around insects until the pressure caused them to pop. For every bird wing she helped to heal, she would paralyze a field mouse until it died from panic; often before Catra could intervene on their behalf. Kat's potential for evil concerned her mother greatly. Catra thought back to that day, one year ago. Seeing her daughter twist her son against his will into the shape of an immobile plant was the event that let Catra know it was time for her daughter's test.

Catra had told her daughter to take care of her belongings, meaning Dan, just before taking a cutting of Dan's plant form. She had played along with Kat's game to avoid interfering with her daughter's year-long trial, in which compassion would reveal itself, and Kat would be saved, or Kat would continue to grow in evil until her judgment and final damnation.

Catra wanted Kat to show enough compassion toward Dan to save herself; to treat him as she would like to be treated. While Kat had treated plant-Dan with respect, and kept him watered and in the light, she was simply taking care of a plant. Not her brother. She made trite observations about his continually mutating appearance without lifting a finger to restore his human form. One day she noticed that his arms had thinned out completely into stalks. She hadn't done anything about it. Another few days went by in which his leaf hands thinned out to become thinner than paper. Kat just dumped another bucket of water on his continually spreading roots.

Staring out at the window at her children, Catra knew this was the final day of her daughter's test. She clasped Dan's cutting in her hand tightly, sending him life energy to sustain him. She renewed the spell of fogginess she had placed over his mind to protect him. Without it, Dan would have spent a year in torment, unable to move. It would have been terrifying for him to feel his mouth and eyes gradually close up, as his brown face became less and less human.

Today, Dan's flower no longer faced the sun. It drooped, along with his leaves and branches, toward the ground. Kat kicked up dust as she dumped another bucket of water on his roots. She looked into his fully seeded flower-face. "Huh. Looking kind of droopy there, Dan."

Catra's fist clenched. She moved from her window, silently, to materialize on the outdoors porch, observing the results of Kat's test. There was nothing more she could do for Kat at this point.

Kat continued. "I guess this is the last day I have to take care of you!" she said, giving Dan's flower a healthy slap. Her face twisted in a wide smirk.

A single seed, as though it were a tear, slowly fell from Dan's face and silently hit the ground. The ground began to shake. Kat looked around in alarm.
1341111111.title: Kat's Mother, Kat's Test.

13411111111.content:
Kat spun around and glared at her mother. Her fiery red hair blew wildly in the gathering wind. "Mother, what's going on? This doesn't feel like a normal earthquake... I can sense an energy... I can't describe it."

Catra calmly walked to the edge of the large wraparound porch and leaned on the railing, Dan's cutting still clenched in her fist. She stood about fifty feet away from her children, one of whom was a rapidly dying sunflower plant. His stalk blew dangerously in the wind. He had no idea who or what he really was, at the moment. Nor of what he would become. But he was safe; Catra was sure of that. It was Kat who was in real danger here, despite all appearances to the contrary.

Catra's heavy, terse reply filled Kat with dread. "Kat, you have failed your test."

Kat's father, Stephen, calmly opened the door to the house and joined his wife on the porch. Taking his pipe into one hand, he only shook his head back and forth slowly. He spoke to Catra, eyes still locked on their daughter. "It's time, then." Catra only nodded.

Where Dan's seed-tear had hit the dusty ground a chasm was rapidly spreading. Silvery mist poured out from a ten foot long crevice, compounding and gathering into itself. It piled and writhed until it had taken the vague shape of an eight foot tall man. The winds died down. The shaking of the earth stopped. The earth sealed itself. An eerie calm took hold of the area, as though time itself had been stopped.

All was silence. The Silvery Man opened his blood red eyes. Kat went through the motions of a scream, but could only choke on her fear. The Silvery Man then spoke in what could only be described as a booming whisper. The sound froze Kat's blood. Her parents knelt on the porch, their faces hidden in a genuflection of respect for this, one of the Powers beyond. The Judge of Evil. Their daughter was lost to them.

"THE BEING KNOWN AS KAT HAS BEEN TRIED AND FOUND EVIL. SHE SHALL BE JUDGED THREEFOLD FOR THE CRIME SHE HAS PERPETUATED AGAINST THE BEING KNOWN AS DAN. INDEED, FOR THE CRIME PERPETUATED AGAINST LIFE AND THE COSMOS ITSELF."

Kat railed against the being in an angry tirade, a torrent of words spilled from her mouth, but their sound was lost in its presence. Kat flailed her arms. Angered motions punctuated the air to no effect. The affront seemingly held no offense to the Power.

It merely continued. "THE BEING KNOWN AS KAT SHALL BE STRIPPED OF HER POWERS. SHE SHALL BE STRIPPED OF HER HUMAN FORM. SHE SHALL BE STRIPPED OF HER VERY SOUL, SET TO WANDER IN LIMBO UNTIL THE APPOINTED TIME."

And with its sentence read, the Power of Judgment of Evil dissipated back into the ether. Time and the cosmos resumed, picking up where they had left off. Kat's fury poured out in full force.

Catra and Stephen rose, silent and understanding observers, unwilling to intervene. Catra opened her fist, taking her husband's hand. She dropped Dan's cutting to the ground. It was no longer needed. As soon as it hit the dirt, it crumbled to ash, all power gone out of it.

"If I am going to go I will at least take this damnable plant with me! The cause of a year of torment and troubles, and the final pain of my failure! Let this freak of nature burn to the ground until wind scatters the ashes!" Laughing maniacally, eyes wide, Kat raised her fist in a destructive stance to summon a fireball. She went pale when she realized she couldn't perform the magic. Any magic, ever again. Kat only whimpered.

The seven foot tall sunflower began to shimmer. Life turned its browning leaves a healthy shade of green. It's grey seeds took on a brown hue, and the yellow petal surrounding the face perked up, a bright yellow. Dan's memories were returning, the haze was lifting from his mind. Two eyes and a mouth opened up among the seeds. A nose poked out from the middle. The contours of a face reasserted themselves, and Dan took the first breath he had taken in over a year. His eyes blinked, and coming out of his daze, he spoke a single word.

"Sister..."

Kat's clothes evaporated in the waning afternoon sun. She stood straight up in the yard, unable to move her legs, as her skin took on a sickly shade of green.

Dan's leaves pushed themselves out into a pair of human hands. His stalk thickened as his organs re-formed in his chest. Air filled his lungs; he could feel his roots receding into his feet, reshaping themselves from out of the earth. His stems bulked up into a pair of semi-human arms.

At the same time, Kat's legs became stuck together. All holes beneath her waist sealed themselves, as her feet began to flake apart and split into a fine root system. Her butt and hips flattened out into a uniform tube, perfect for transporting water to the rest of her rapidly forming plant vascular system. Her arms turned green, and her breasts receded into her thinning stalk. She grasped at them with her hands, unable to stop the changes. She stammered and looked around in a panic, unable to twist her body. In a bit of cosmic justice, Kat's mouth sealed itself shut forever as her lips melted into her face.

Dan's legs split, leaving him naked. He slumped to the ground on newly human knees. His parents ran over to him, draping him with a robe as his head and neck thickened to match his now human torso. His petals fell out, one by one. His skin turned back to a pale tan, and his black hair re-sprouted. He looked up at his parents, confused and scared by what was going on. All three turned to watch the final stages of Kat's transformation.

Kat reached toward Dan with rapidly thinning hands, her eyes full of hatred. Her arms diminished to stems, as the changes crept up her neck. It became nothing more than the upper portion of a plant stalk. Her skull flattened and her ears disappeared. Kat's red hair blew away as yellow petals poked out from under her green skin, unfurling in layers to frame her newly brown face. It bore a striking resemblance to Dan's as he had voiced his protests that day, one year ago. Unable to move and stripped of her human body, Kat had turned completely into a sunflower, with only a face, a pair of eyes, remaining.

Dan and his parents stood by, watching all of this silently. Kat began to lose her human height, until she was no more than 12 inches tall. A pair of tiny eyes stared up at her former family, blinking in the sunlight.

Catra and Stephen glanced nervously at each other, for this was the final day of Dan's trial as well.

What do you do now?

Maybe I'll even get to pick your sissy name. Who knows? Could be simply Dan to Danielle, or it could be one of those sissy names that are meant to be over the top girly girl. Can't wait to find out."

"You're crazy." Dan said, now very scared.

"Maybe. Or I could just be sick of all the shit you've given me over the years. I'm not really sure myself." Kat replied, "But you only have about 55 minutes left until people start seeing a sissy-to-be. I'll see you in a few hours bro."

14533111.content:
Dan sat there for a few minutes, letting the explanation sink in before quickly getting up and bolting to his room.

"OK, I'll lock myself up in here and hopefully that'll stop this curse-thing from doing anything." He said to himself, "Let's see, food?"

He looked at his stash of snacks (he kept it on hand for gaming and studying sessions), but found that it was looking rather bare.

"Shit." He muttered. "How long have I got?"

He looked at his watch. He had 50 minutes left.

"OK, the store's not far away. I can do this." Dan said, quickly getting ready and leaving the house. 45 Minutes left.

-------------

It took him about 15 minutes to walk to the store and another 5 to grab enough stuff to last him a while, but when he got to the checkout, things weren't as simple.

"Sorry sir," the cashier said to the person a few places ahead in the line. "I'm afraid the register isn't working properly today, the item scanner has broken and we can't repair it until tomorrow. We apologize for the inconvenience but I'm going to have to enter the information in manually."

The man huffed. "Fine. Good thing I'm only after a couple of items anyway."

*Good for him,* Dan thought, *Not so good for me. I've got all this stuff and I've only got...* He glanced at his watch. *25 minutes left!*

Thankfully there weren't any large purchases before him, so it about another five minutes before it was his turn.

"." The cashier said, gradually working his way through Dan's purchase. "There a party going on? That's a lot of snacks."

"...Yeah, it was my job to get the food and drink and I kinda got caught up in other stuff. Just remembered about it." Dan replied, quickly making up an explanation.

"Fair enough. At least you got them before the party." The cashier replied, chatting with Dan as he processed everything. It was about 5 minutes or so for all of Dan's stuff to get put through.

"That'll be 20 dollars." The cashier said. Dan fished around in his wallet and found his bank card. Inserting it into the machine, the cashier's expression soured a little. "Huh, it's not picked up the card. Just remove it and re-insert it again."

Dan sighed, and eventually the sale went through. Glancing at his watch, Dan winced. 13 minutes left.

"I can make it if I run." He said, breaking into a run once he left the store.

-------------

"Not much time left, I'm nearly home." Dan said, slowing down for a moment to check his watch. He was only down to a few minutes. He decided to sprint the rest of the way, just one corner left to go...

SMACK!

He'd just run straight into someone and fallen over them.

"Ugh, watch where you're going!"

*Uh-oh.* Dan thought. He recognized that voice as one of the girls in his class.

"Are you OK Paige?"

Dan recognized that one too. Crap. He was dealing with Paige and Liz, two girls from school who were always together.

"Sorry about that." Dan said, getting up and helping Paige up. He went to pick his stuff up, only for Paige to get up close. She squinted her eyes for a moment before realizing who had run into her.

"Dan?" She asked, angrily. "What the hell?"

"I'm sorry Paige, I didn't mean to." He replied, trying to get to the stuff he'd bought so he could leave. "I'll just go."

"Oh no you don't." Paige replied, stopping him. "I'm not done with you."

"You practically tackled her." Liz chimed in. "You think sorry is going to be enough?"

Dan tried to reply, but he couldn't find any words to calm the two girls down. He then saw their eyes glow pink for a moment before he realized that time was up.

Dan woke up in his bed. When he looked around, though, his room looked completely different. The walls were now painted a dark purple color- a color he had once thought of using before ruling it out as too girly. There were still posters of his favorite movie actresses, but the "Babes with Big Butts" calendar was gone, replaced by one with pictures of landscapes. There were girlish flower decals on the walls, too. Sitting up, long, dark brown hair cascaded down the sides of Dan's face. He tried to figure how Kat had done it... maybe with helium? He absentmindedly brushed his face and realized that he had no facial hair, not even stubble. Kat must have shaved him too, to top it all off!
"Kat! Get in here now!" Kat rushed into his room, a giddy expression on her face.
"Hello, Dan!" she said, over-enunciating her words.

Kat chuckled. "Oh, is she now, Dan, or should I say Danielle? You haven't looked in the mirror yet, have you?" She gestured towards the full-length mirror on the wall. Dan hadn't had a mirror in his room before, so he hadn't noticed it. He walked over and stood in front of it.
In the reflection Dan saw a modestly attractive girl. She was wearing the same type of clothing as he had been, a graphic T-shirt and blue jeans. He held up his right hand and wiggled his fingers; the girl in the mirror did the same. Thinking it must be a trick, he reached down and removed his shirt. "Simple, you doofus. I turned you into a girl version of yourself. Basically, you're you if you had been born as a girl, but everything else was the same. You have the same interests, the same goals, the same hopes and desires, but with the perspective of being a girl. As a girl, you were never afraid to do stuff out of fear of appearing girly or effeminate, and never felt pressured to be masculine. You just developed naturally, free of social pressures, so you are, in theory, happier than you were as a boy. This is a lesson, though, about not treating women as objects, so I left your sexual orientation the same. Then, hopefully, you'll realize that lesbianism isn't some erotic male fantasy, but a legitimate form of relationship."

15231112212.content:
Suddenly, Kat laughed. It was a laugh than forced your smile to flatten completely.

"Forgetting something?" she asked. "I made you my twin, which means that I can not change you back into a boy." she smiled, shaking her head. "You are my twin sister for life, that 'boy' transformation will wear off in three... two... one..."

Just as Kat reached zero in her little count down, you returned to being her twin sister. "It was worth a try." you said.

"Why did you try to return to your old self?" asked Kat, looking hurt. "Don't you want to be a witch?"

"You are completely missing the point, sis." you said. "I just want to be a boy again for the party then change back to shock Ron and Don, just as they start to beg me for help."

Kat looked at you for a moment then laughed, shaking the room."You 'do' have a mean streak after all." she said. "It's a great idea but a magical disguise will work better."

"Um... Kat?" you asked, gathering some courage. "If I gain enough points, is it possible to be free from being tormented and humiliated in less than five years?"

"I was wondering when you were going to ask that." she said, smiling. "Yes, you can 'buy' your freedom from me in less than a year, but it will cost you 'all' of your rights and freedoms for that time." she paused. "Five years of intense pain and discomfort or one year of sheer hell, that is your choice."

You sighed. "Not much of a choice." you thought.

"I really don't care, either way, sis." said Kat, frankly. "In the end, regardless of what I decide to do with you and your friends, you will walk away from this a full powered witch. In time, you will train your first born daughter as I trained you, tormenting her closest male relative."

"I see." you said. you paused. "Which is more fun?"

Kat giggled. "For you or me?"

"Both." you replied.

"The five year run is better as it will give us both practice and it is a great bonding experience." said Kat. "why do you think she and aunt Maxine get along so well?"

You nodded, understanding the Maxine must have been Max in her childhood. "So what now?" you asked.

"We still have a few hours before our 'guests' arrive. said Kat, looking at her watch. "Since you earned double points by my 'master's' command, why don't you get some magic practice in by..."

1523111222.title: Something else.

15231112221.content:
You thought hard then asked, "If I make make a choice that pleases you, will you award extra points?"

Kat shrugged, hiding her smile. "Damn, she's good!" she thought. "I'm glad I made her my twin!" then she replied, "That all depends upon my mood, which you will have to guess at."

You frowned, knowing that Kat was very good at hiding her true emotions. "Damn, but she's good!" you thought. "I'm beginning to like being her twin sister!"

Finally, a thought came you your mind. "Well, since it's our birthday, I think it would be fair if I transformed into n animal that would make us both happy."

"That makes sense." replied Kat. "So, what animal did you have in mind?"

You scuffed your feet onto the ground, wondering weather or not to tell her your idea. "Aw, you'd just laugh at me." you said, suddenly sounding down.

Kat looked at you for a moment, showing a hint of sisterly concern. "I might and I might not." she said. "Just tell me, what animal did you have in mind?"

You paused, hesitant. "Well, a few years back, you said that you always wanted a German Shepard." you told her, tear forming. "I scrimped and saved to get you one for your sweet sixteenth birthday, you can ask mom."

Kat came closer, her full attention on you. "What happened?" she asked.

You held back a sob. "Some one robbed me before I could get to the pet store to buy it." you said, tearfully. "That's why I had a black eye and a lot of bruises, coming to your party. I did all I could to get you that German Sheppard!"

A single tear escaped Kat's eye as she held a neutral expression but she was quick to hide it. "I see." she said. "You wish to give me that German Sheppard for a few hours."

You nodded. "Yeah." you said. "I've been feeling guilty about that day ever since."

Suddenly, Kat walked up and pulled you into a warm hug, causing you to sob quietly. "Why didn't you say anything,?" she asked, breaking the embrace. "Mom could have done something."

"I didn't know she was a witch." you replied. "Besides, back then, I fought my own battles."

Kat nodded. "I really appreciate you choosing this animal for me." she said, serious. she then grinned. "But, because you did not specify a gender... I get to pick!"

What gender did Kat choose for your temporary new form?

"I am your master, which means, you are my 'bitch'!" said Kat, laughing. "Besides, I can never make you male again, regardless of the species."

"What... What are you going to do to me?" you asked.

Kat laughed. "You'll see." she said. you began to cry and she became annoyed. "Oh, stop it!, show some dignity!"

"I... I can't help it." you cried. "I don't even know 'why' I'm crying.... ahrooooo!"

Hearing your howl, Kat bent over, laughing, holding her stomach. "You're in heat!" she laughed. "This couldn't be more perfect, if I had planned it!"

"I'm in what!?!" you asked. then it hit you. "Oh, God, you're going to make me search for a mate! I... Ahrooooo!"

You could not stop yourself, the female canine urges were very strong within you and, by the amused look on Kat's face, she had not intended this but she was not about to stop it either. You continued to howl for company as Kat secured a dog collar around your neck.

"You are going to make a great mother dog!" she laughed.

Then, the collar glowed before snapping off of you, striking Kat in the face. "Ow!"

You tried not to laugh, as you knew that it would make things worse for you but Kat sensed your emotions. "you think that's funny, Dani?" she asked. "We'll see how funny you think it is when you are pregnant with puppies!"

Then, a flash of light was seen and two young women you did not recognize appeared before you and Kat. "You knew the consequences of transforming your little brother into your twin sister, Katherine." said the first witch. "Making Dani pregnant with puppies before she can begin to draw from her power source, Ron, will change her status as a witch."

"As such, you will have crossed the line." said the second witch. "The punishment for such a crime is complete role reversal, Dani will become the first born and you will become her pregnant 'bitch'."

Kat sighed, frustrated. "Yes, madam coven." she said.

The two witches smiled. "After Dani starts to draw power from Ron, then you can make your puppies." said the first witch. she giggled. "Just remember your agreement with her. For every minute of humiliation and pain she receives, she can use to humiliate Ron"

The second witch then changed you back to your normal female state. "Just to let you know, your sister went through a lot of trouble to get us to allow her to make you her twin sister." she said. "Each humiliation is a lesson in magic, take it as such, ask questions, and you will learn quickly."

With that the two witches vanished and Kat turned to you, blushing. "As I told you, we witches must follow strict rules to keep ourselves secret from the world." she said. "The punishment for breaking those rules are equally strict."

You shrugged. "Actually, I think it would be cool to have a litter of puppies." you said. "Mom always told me to keep an open mind for different views." you paused. "Maybe after the party, Ron can be the 'father' and after the puppies are born and weened, we can..."

You giggled. "Wouldn't that be a surprise to him?"

Kat roared with laughter. "Humiliating you is going to be fun!" she said. "Especially when I get to watch you turn it all back on Ron!"

"They're all really lessons, right?" you asked.

"Right." confirmed Kat. "The humiliation part drives the point of the lesson home, it's a time tested tradition." she sighed. "Only, now that you know..."

You suddenly smiled. "I'll forgive you if you throw in a few humiliations in for fun, as long as I get points for it."

Kat smiled with you, only her smile was more evil. "Well, you are going to need points to earn some fun time with Ron tonight and I have the perfect way to do it!"

With that, she dragged you back the house, up the stairs into the bathroom. There, she closed and locked the door.

"What are you going to do to me in here?" you asked, puzzled.

Kat smiled then waved her hand. You immediately felt dizzy and slowly transformed into...

She pushed your body all the way in, until your bowl like head fitted over the toilet rim.

With that, she positioned your ears over the holes for the screws then placed the toilet seat onto your face, driving the screws through your ear lobes, tightening the bolts onto place. Finally, Kat pulled her panties and skirt back up and turned to you, seeing your tears. "Just think of all the point you are earning, Dani." she said. "I'll release you in time to shower and brush your teeth before the party." she then gave an evil giggle, eying you. "Until then... enjoy!"

She then flushed the toilet, sending a number of streams of water into your mouth, forcing you to swallow her shit whole. you wanted to vomit but the magic prevented it and the shit, piss, and used tampon settled into your stomach and your body slowly began to digest it. Kat gave you one last evil look then carefully washed her hands and left the bathroom as mom came in, with an urgent look on her face.

152311122212121.content:
You saw the steam rising from the water and immediately knew that it was extremely hot. There was no time, in your mind, to protest so you decided to try to use your own magic to change the temperature of the water. The only problem was that you did not know if there was a specific way of going about it.

"Warm water!" you thought, trying to will your magic to do the rest. "Warm water, warm water!"

Then, without realizing it, you mumbled a few words in Latin, just before Kat placed you in the bath water. You winced but then relaxed as you realized that you were successful, the water was a comfortable warm temperature. A low sigh of both relief and pleasure escaped your lips as you slid into the water and Kat began to bathe you, giggling.

"Congratulations, sis!" she said, scrubbing your back. "That was a test of magic power and you passed."

"A test?" you asked. "what for?"

"Do see if my transformation and humiliations had sparked the start of magic within you." replied Kat. "You see, as my younger twin, a kick in the ass is needed get you to discover and use your power."

"Hence the need for the humiliations?" you guessed correctly.

"Exactly." confirmed Kat. "Each humiliation, up to this point was to get you angry or desperate enough to summon your magic powers and use them."

"So, once I start drawing power from Ron..."

"The humiliations become training so you can fight another witch, if you have to." replied Kat. "Like everything else, there is good and evil in the witching world." she paused, looking fearful. "Only if a witch attacks you, it will not be to humiliate you... (gulp)... it will be to kill you for your magical power."

"To make them stronger." you again guessed correctly. "That's creepy!"

"That's life as a witch." said Kat, seriously, moving onto your long hair. "you will need to defend yourself and fight back against those who would take your life for your power."

You suddenly smiled. "They will have their hands full with us."

Kat smiled with you. "Yes, they would." she agreed. "But we also have to keep an eye on Don and Ron. An evil witch could, with effort, draw power from them as well, making us less powerful in the end."

"I had not thought of that." you said, concerned.

"I have no intention of purposely killing them." said Kat. "But a witch, not related to them, will not hesitate to do so."

"There is so much to learn." you said, worried. "You were given a crash course."

"Believe me, I'm still learning." replied Kat with a shiver. "I am in the same boat as you are only I will be getting humiliated by my mom at random times."

"Will she humiliate me as well?" you asked.

Your question got Kat thinking. "I'm not sure." she said. "Let's not give her any ideas, though."

You nodded. "Agreed."

Later, you and Kat stepped into the living room with Don and Ron waiting for you, resting in...
152311122212121.title: A test of magic.

1523111222121212.content:
Don and Ron were the first guests to arrive. Unknown to them, they were actually the guests of honor as their lives were about to forever change, just as yours had. "It's a pleasure to meet you two again." you said, approaching them.

"The pleasure is all yours, I'm sure." replied Don, coldly.

You smiled. "I'm sure."

Don smirked, then turned to Ron. "It looks like Ms Switch was right, Kat has a twin sister."

Ron, your power source, looked around. "Where's Dan?" he asked. "Did he finally get sick of living in a house of whores and ran from home?"

Inwardly, you wanted to throttle Ron for his statement, instead, you merely smiled. "He's never coming back, if that's what you are asking." you said. "Dan needed a... well, a change."

Kat giggled, knowing that you were mostly telling the truth, though Ron did not catch on. "I wonder how she is going to humiliate him first." she thought. "She can't do much as I had not taught her any spells yet." she then smiled. "Then again, Dani has surprised me before."

"A change, huh?" asked Ron, unimpressed. "What kind of shit talk is that!?"

Suddenly, a broad grin formed onto your face. "You want to talk 'shit'?" you asked. "I can talk shit."

You walked up to Ron and quickly pulled him in for a kiss. But instead of kissing him, you used your magic to eject the shit you had been forced to swallow and sent it down Ron's throat! Ron shook and convulsed, his screams being silenced by your own mouth over his. Kat fought the urge to laugh out loud, knowing what you were doing.

"Well played." she thought. "Forcing Ron to share your pain and suffering is a good tactic, as long as you don't take it too far and break the rules."

When you were done 'sharing' with Ron, you stepped away from him and he slumped into a chair, stunned. After seeing what had happened to his brother, Don took a step back, not knowing what to do or think...

"Do you want to talk shit ass well?" you asked.

Stay at my side at all times and you will live through this, eventually earning your freedom back... try to escape and I will punish you in ways you will never forget."

15433.content:
BOOOM!

Everyone scattered, or stood where they were and screamed as one wall exploded loudly, causing bits of drywall and brick to fly in all directions. Some of the gatherers ran, or vanished into thin air. The rest, including Kat seemed to be frozen where they stood as a group of six tall men entered the room through the whole.

Dressed in flowing black trench coats with matching gloves, pants and boots that weren't even marred by dust from the explosion, they spread out and eyed the gathered parties warily.

Five of the men each recited a spell that Dan couldn't understand and held out their gloved hands. A small fireball appeared from thin air, which the men held up threateningly, like a snowball with ice chunks in it.

The tallest of the men, a dark haired man with a military style crew cut, gazed at the party goers one by one, before his eyes rested on Kat.

Suddenly conscious, Dan moved to cover himself. Strange how the sight of his family didn't make him so modest.

"You don't have anything I haven't seen," the man said, not looking in Dan's direction. He approached Kat, pointing at her. "And you, young lady, are about to make the first biggest mistake of your career. It will be your last."

Kat lowered her eyes, flipping the page over like a kid who got caught drawing nude pictures in her math book.

"Who are you?" She asked, definatly.

"Your mother never told you about us?" The man turned from Kat. He wasn't in the least bit afraid of her. Dan couldn't tell if he admired him or thought he was a fool.

"Where are you Gwen?" He asked of the crowd.

Mom, it had seemed, was one of the ones who escaped. The other men scanned the crowd.

"She's not here," the dark skinned man with a dragon tatoo spoke up. "These are all extended family members. Mundanes."

The leader turned back to Kat.

"That's not looking good for you." He said, raising his hand and whispering in that language.

In a series of moments that happened too fast for Dan to percieve, he found himself wrapped in a coat very similar to the ones they were wearing. The cage snapped open and the book flew from Kat's hand and she was forced to her knees by an unseen force. The leader turned to Dan.

"What is your name?"

"You don't know?" Dan asked, surprised. He stepped out of the cage, wrapping the coat tightly around his body.

"How observant of you," he said, drawing a chuckle from the others. "I cannot read minds and you were not wearing a name tag at this gathering of fools. Now you have a choice. But first, I must have your name."

Dan didn't realize he was trembling until he looked down at his sister. She glared at the men with contempt, her eyes passing over them with an intensity that was as strong as...well, judging from the way the men stayed in their respective posts, about as strong as throwing Chiclets at an oncomming train.

"Daniel," he said, looking up at the leader.

"Daniel," The leader repeated. "My name is Marke Thornvauld. And like you, a person once abused magick power to humiliate me. All of us-" He swept his arm to indicate the remaining men. - "Have been violated by those like her."

Kat screamed in rage as Marke pointed at her. She jumped to her feet attacked, trying to claw at his face. He easily side stepped her, tripping her and allowing her to fall face first to the floor.

A series of chains appeared around her.

"And now we possess the powers of the ones who wronged us." Marke finished, never taking his eyes from Dan. "Daniel, that option is now yours. As I said before, you have a choice."
15433.title: An Untimely Interruption

choices: Is it worth it to attack Kat?
Do you Accept your responsibility and position and answer to Marke?
154331.content:
"Take her power and join us," Marke said. "Or, you can help us find the ones responsible. She will be punished, as will those who escaped us tonight and you will be a civilian again, but in a safer situation."

Dan looked down at his sister as Marke spoke. Two of the men pulled her to her feet and stood her beside Marke. She glared at Dan, threateningly.

"Don't you dare take my power," she said with a hiss.

Anger spread over Dan faster than his embarassment. Ever the self professed princess, Kat still believed she was in charge. The chains around her body and the fact that more powerful people than she was surrounded her wouldn't change that fact.

"What do you mean, take her power?" He asked, matching Kat's glare.

Before Kat could say anything, a gag appeared over her mouth.

"Her power is still young and weak," Marke said, giving her a scrutinizing once over. "But for your age it will be appropriately strong. You will officially be our apprentice until you are able to wield the power effectively."

"But how can I have her power?" Dan asked. "Mother always said that only the women had that magick."

Marke laughed.

"Gwen would tell you that," he said. "Sadly, both her ignorange and delusions are the reason her time is limited. Oh, don't worry, she won't be killed. Death would be too good for her. As is, if she is not recovered shortly-" Marke stepped in front of Kat to look directly in her eyes as he said, "You will suffer the punishment meant for her."

If that meant anything to Kat, her eyes didn't show it. Her look was still indiginant and entitled, as if this were all some sort of inconvenience to her.

"She is a witch, or a Wielder, however you wish to call it." Marke continued, turning to Dan. "As such she is charged with wielding her magick responsibly and for the good of mankind. When a Wielder abuses this power, whatever the reason, the people harm must be healed and compensated.

"In your case, you are the target of your sister's magick. Because she is your blood, and her magick was used to harm rather than protect and presever you, the compensation is that you will be offered her power. You must learn to wield it and you will be held to the same laws that she is bound to, but you will justice."

"And the other thing?" Dan asked. "You said I'd be protected either way."

Marke nodded.

"If you choose not to take her power, it will be returned to the Source," he answered. "But you were the only person who witnessed this event who understands what is happening. They-" Marke indicated the witnesses still present. They were now in a deep sleep and the Wielders no longer watched them. "Are mundane humans and will be subject to mundane punishments for witnessing this sick display."

Marke spat the word.

"But you, as the victim will be compensated with a new life. Far from here and with no memory of what happened to you. All your current ailments will be healed and you will suffer no psychological trauma for what occurred to you. If you wish it, you will be academically and athletically gifted so that you will have the chances you were denied by your family due to their neglicence in properly educating your sister."

Wow, I thought. If I had known what a cherry gig it would be, I would have told my sister to do her worse.

But as Dan looked at his sister, knowing how she treated him. He thought of the other Wielders in the room. How had they been abused? What was done to them to make them who they were?

Would I have the power to protect someone else's little sister or brother? He wondered.

He hated school. Even if they could make him the next Joe Dimaggio or the next Einstein, he doubted that would ever change. Becoming a Wielder, having their job, suddenly sounded far better than anything school could have prepared him for.

"I'll take her power," He said. Her reaction was worth it. The gag muffled her scream and the rage in her eyes was practically intoxicating. "Sorry Kat. Maybe if we get Mom you'll get a light sentence. But I can't let you guys get away with this."

Marke smiled. The other Wielders exchanged nods of approval as Marke removed his gloves.

"Give me your hand," he said.

Reluctantly, Dan held it out. He trembled as he kept the coat closed with the other hand. The first thing he wanted to do when this was over was get some more clothes on. Marke took his hand gently. It was callused and rough, but his grip was loose.

He took Kat's with the other. She struggled against the chains but it was useless.

Marke whispered an incantation in what Dan guessed was his native language. He overheard enough language arts students in his school to guess that it sounded Latin.

As he spoke, a surge passed from Kat to Dan. It rattled his body and warmed him from head to toe as his skin began to glow. She glowed as well, but as she grew dimmer he grew brighter. Marke seemed to be in pain but he kept held his grip.

When Dan returned to normal, Marke let go.

But Dan realized. Something's different.

He let the coat fall to the floor. His nudity didn't bother him this time. It didn't have time to as he pictured clothes in his mind. The softest, most comfortable socks and boots appeared at his feet. Black jeans formed around his legs along with boxers that were as light as if he had worn nothing at all. A tight black t-shirt with an image of a wolf howling at the moon apeared over his torso and a loose fitting, unbuttoned dress shirt formed over it.

"Sweet," he said.

He looked at Kat, who looked sick as she fell back to the floor. Her chains were gone.

"Daniel," Marke said, his voice deep and offering no chance for argument. "You are now an Apprentice Wielder. Do you accept the responsibility of learning to strengthen your power and use it to the benefit of mankind?"

Dan looked at Marke, but his eyes kept drifting to Kat. The urge to return the favor was so strong right now. But surrounded by more experienced Wielders was a bit of a challenge.

Maybe they'd allow him one small vengeance. It was a worth a shot, wasn' t it?

'You see,' Kat said, 'I've been given what has been called unlimited cosmic power... And I'm going to use it to torment you cos, heck, why not?'
'Unlimited... That sounds bad...'
'Oh, it most definitely is. What I want, is for the while rest of the town to think of you like I do; like a little monster.'
'Wha-' but before he finished his question, there was a flash of light, which left Dan in complete darkness once it was extinguished.
He saw that he was alone and was now standing in an alleyway that he didn't recognize. The moon was high in the sky and there was a low mist dancing at knee level.
'How in the-,' he half-asked, examining his surroundings for signs of his sister. Nothing.
Deciding he'd better make his way home, he exited the alleyway and was delighted to see that he vaguely recognized the street he was on; he had been transported to the nearby centre of the city.
Dan tapped one of the many pedestrians that walked past him and asked, 'Sorry, I was wondering if you could tell me how to get home?'
But, when the man turned, his jaw dropped and sheer terror spread across his face. Uncomfortable seconds passed and the man roared, 'It's him! It's Dan, EVERYBODY RUN!!'
At once, each face on the street turned, and adopted the same look of terror that the screaming man had just been wearing. Then, panic ensued; they screamed and scattered. People abandoned their cars and, shouting, 'Help! Somebody help!'
Dan felt slightly awkward. He was unsure as to what to do. He got the vibe that he wasn't supposed to join the panic, and yet he felt that standing there wasn't the course of action. Deciding to take action, he opened his mouth and said, 'Eh...'
'They think you're a monster,' Kat's voice suddenly rang out.
'Why? Do I look like a monster? I don't look like a monster!'
'No, but they think you do. They think you're a creature that comes within the night and kills and eats them and turns them into one of your kind with a single bite.'
'Like a vampire?' it was strange speaking to a disembodied voice, especially while the street continued to empty, as he didn't know where to look.
'More like a 'Dan-pire,' but basically, yes, now I'd run if I were you... Before the angry villagers come to get you...'

It actually felt a bit painful, and Dan doubled over as his insides shifted.

"What...are...you doing to...me?" he gasped.

"My dear brother, I think it would be obvious by now,"she giggled."Or, should I say dear sister Danielle?"

"What..my voice..what..why?"

"Why? Well, for one thing because I can, and because I always wanted a sister I could relate to."

"I'll never be a sister you can relate to!" he yelled at her.His chest changed and grew into 34C cup breasts an he felt his penis recede and reshape along with his lower regions as his

anatomy became ever more feminine in every way. Sweat dripped from her as the pain raced through her insides.

"My oh my, don't you realize who is in charge here," Kat told her, as she licked a finger and waved a wand that she seemed to get out of nowhere,

"What...you did something else too, my voice, my body...my clothes, and what's that smell, mom's perfume?"

She lead Danielle over to a nearby mirror, "Take a good long look," she said with a grin.

"Since you refuse to be my sister, I decided instead you would be my aunt."

"That is why the geometric designed red and white dress, and the pearl necklace and then heels, and..."

"Yes, you are now a stylish middle aged woman, and tonight we will..."
1552322.title: No, go with the option given!!

choices: your age will change at random to older or younger
your clothing will change to older/younger styles at random
15523221.content:
You happen to check your makeup in the mirror, and head out into the living room.

"Hey sis," your mother tells you, as you go sit on the couch near her.

"Uhh, hi there...Sally?"

"Why so nervous sis? You'd think you weren't used to the two of us hanging out together."

You really weren't, though as your reality appeared to have changed there was nothing to do but go along with it. The clothing felt strange, as well as the extra weight from

the breasts, and no penis. He...she'd have to remember to sit to pee.

"Hello, earth to Danielle," your mom teased.

"Oh, sorry dear...not every day I turn 40."

"And I turn 18," your real sister...now your niece chimed in.

"By the way, I took the liberty of inviting a guy to join us for drinks later. You know, just meet him and see what you think?"

"Oh crap," you thought, she's fixing me up with a guy...what now?

"Don't look so surprised," she told you, noting the look of shock on your face. "You've been divorced for three years now, and you need to get back into the dating scene.

I am just helping things along."

"I suppose," you tell her, as people start to arrive.

"Just give him a chance, you might even like him."

About that time the guests started to arrive and your sister pulls you aside for a moment into the kitchen.

"Just to make things interesting....
15523221.title: celebrate me turning 18 and you turning forty

choices: They go to a very adult lounge
They go to a nice restaurant
155232211.content:
Kat grinned at you and said, "Just to keep things interesting, I will make it so your age will change at random to an age older or younger. Oh, and as your age changes so will the circumstances you find yourself in."

"That is just wonderful, anything else I need to know?"

" Just that in certain ways you can also effect the people you are with, except for me of course."

About that time, Danielle heard her mom...err...sister holler at her and she broke away from Kat to head out with some other adults.
