1552331.content: Does Kat turn her brother into her grandmother?
1552331.title: Grandma Danny?

1552332.content:
Dan awoke several hours later to the sound of chatter and general noise. It sounded like a party.

He rubbed his eyes and looked around. He was naked! And... in a cage??? He was still in his house, but the room was decorated with party equipment, with a large banner hanging off the ceiling with the words "HAPPY WITCHDAY, KAT!" written across it.

Dan stood upright and looked around the room. It was full of people, including both his parents. He looked at them in confusion and desperation, but they just smiled reassuringly, as if keeping your son in a cage was normal, everyday life.

"Hello, Danny boy." It was Kat. "I got a party after all. Quite a surprise! My 18th birthday is my "Witchday", apparently, so it's pretty important."

"Can I ask why I'm locked away naked like an animal?!" Dan was furious.

"It's tradition for new witches to perform a spell on their closest relative. In our family, this spell is usually transformation..."

The lights dimmed and Kat prepard her magic equipment. The guests focused on Dan as Kat began to read a spell.

What spell is she casting?
1552332.title: Naked, caged, and about to be transformed...

15523321.content:
(Originally written by TFTM on CYOC.net)

Dan felt a tingle all over his body. He shrank a few inches, and then he felt very strange in his chest. His chest was swelling, getting bigger with every passing moment. As they did, his hands that had been covering his privates this whole time, he didn't feel anything anymore. He lifted his hands, and to his surprise, there wasn't anything there anymore, besides s small slit. His hair grew, and finally his new breasts stopped growing.
His skin was much more soft now, and now his hands were smaller too. He felt his hair brushing against his back.

"What just happened?" he asked, grabbing his head. He felt dizzy now, and he heard his voice had a much higher pitch to it now. He heard clapping from his family members.

"Great job, Kat." his mom said.

"Mom, what's going on?" I asked.

"Nothing, dear. You've just been turned into a girl"

"A girl?! But...but how?"

"Kat's a witch, as we said before, and this was her first spell."

"Be thankful" Kat said, "Now, when you turn 18, you'll have the same powers I do"

"Exactly" Dan's mom said.

"But I don't want to have to be a girl! What am I going to tell my girlfriend?" he asked.

"Not my problem" Kat said, unlocking the cage.
15523321.title: Option 1

155233211.content:
(Originally written by looney28 on CYOC.net)

Dan stepped out of the cage and glared at Kat. "Turn me back," he said shaking with suppressed rage.

"She won't do that Dani," their mom said coming over and draping a blanket over Dan's shoulders.

"You can make her or you can change me back," Dan said wrapping the blanket around himself.

"Let's go up to your room and we'll talk about it," his mom said with a smile.

With nothing else to do Dan followed his mom up to his room. Once inside she pulled out a wand and started muttering a spell. He
couldn't hear the words she was saying but the tip glowed as soon as she finished speaking and then the glow extinguished after a few
seconds. Dan looked around but didn't see that anything had changed. "What did you do?" he asked.

"Oh I just changed your clothes a bit," his mom said with a smile. "I decided to leave the majority of your room untouched. Now to get
you dressed so you can get back down to the party."

"Aren't you going to change me back?" Dan asked as his mom went to his dresser.

"No and I'll tell you why," his mom said opening a drawer and pulling out a matching set of bra and panties. "I know you don't think it
right now but Kat gave you a great gift on her witchday."

"She turned me into a girl," Dan said shocked. "How can that be a great gift?"

"Well now that you're a girl you'll become a witch when you turn eighteen," his mom said going over to his closet and pulling out a
dress.

"But I don't want to be a girl," Dan said whining. "Besides how would I explain this to my girlfriend?"

His mom sat down on his bed and said, "Well I can suppress her memory of you if you want. If not then you'll just have to tell her the
truth and hope she understands."

"Why do I have to be a girl though?" Dan said getting frustrated.

"Come sit down," his mom said setting the clothes aside and patting the bed beside her. Dan sighed and sat down. His mom put an
around around him and said, "You've spent most of your life annoying your sister. I would punish you and tell you that would would
regret it someday but you never learned. Well that someday was today. Kat was right when she said that it was tradition to perform a
spell on the closest relative. Because of all the years you had annoyed her I thought she was going to change you into a cockroach or
some animal. She didn't do that though. Instead she decided to transform you into a girl so you could share something special. I'll tell
you what though. Try being a girl for six months and if you still want to change back into a boy I'll convince Kat to change you back.
Though that will also come with a promise of not annoying her on purpose after you change back."

"Why six months? Can't it be shorter?"

"I want you to have enough time to experience being a girl so you don't make a hasty decision. What do you say? Do we have a deal?"

"Do I have to wear dresses and skirts?"

"Well there will be times where I will insist on it but those will be special occasions and if we go out to a nice restaurant. Other than that
it will be your decision."

"The girls at school have to wear skirts though."

"Well you can drop out if you want like we let Kat. Of course if you become a boy again you'll be going right back."

Dan sighed and said, "Ok I'll give being a girl a chance."

"That's my girl," his mom said ruffling his hair. "Now let's get you dressed so you can go back down to your and Kat's party."

"My and Kat's party?" Dan asked confused.

"Kat regressed you a little bit so today is your sixteenth birthday," his mom said with a smile. "Now get dressed so we can go back
down Dani. I'll help you dress since this will be your first time dressing as a girl. Oh your first name is Daniella now."

Dan allowed his mom to help him dress in the clothes she picked out trying to wrap his head around what he had learned. After he was
dressed with a pair of sandals with a slight heel on his feet his mom applied a little lip gloss, blush, and eye shadow. Pronouncing
herself satisfied that Dan looked good she led him back down to the party.
155233211.title: Dani's Gift From Kat

1552332111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

Gingerly, Dani descended the first few steps of the stairs with hand tightly gripping the railing. While the feminine heels of her sandals were only about an inch and a half high, they narrowed towards the bottom, causing a lot of wobbling from the teen’s delicate ankles. This presented a real possibility of falling for the inexperienced girl.

“Tsk, that won’t work, at all,” Dani’s mother said from behind her. “I suppose I can do you one more favor today.”

With a gesture, she cast another spell. Instantly, Dani felt her balance improve and her posture adjust itself. The next couple of steps came much easier, and after that, she practically floated the rest of the way down the stairs.

At the bottom, Kat waited, grinning from ear to ear. “Took you long enough. Cute dress, Daniella.” Beyond the closed door to the living room, they could hear the sounds of the party guests chatting away, unaware of the confrontation between the two birthday girls.

Dani winced at hearing her altered name. “Shut up. You did this to me!”

“Didn’t Mom explain it to you?” Kat laughed, rolling her eyes. “This is a gift! And an expensive one, I might add. As a new witch, I really don’t have a whole lot of power of my own. That’ll come with practice. But today, I was getting a boost from all the witches at the party as a witchday present. I could’ve used it to turn you into any number of nasty things, and you would’ve been stuck that way until I had enough power to reverse it, which could take years. Instead, I chose to spend my present making your life better.”

“Better!?” Dani nearly screamed before glancing at the door and lowering her voice to a hiss. “My life was going just fine until now, and you had no right to make it ‘better’ without my permission.”

Kat tilted her head as if the concept were foreign to her. “Of course I did. I’m a witch, and you’re not. At least, not yet. It’s not fair, but that’s how the universe laid things out for us. And if I wanted to, I could be cruel, but you’re my br-I mean, sister. And now, you can be much more than just human. Don’t waste this opportunity.”

“It’s disgusting,” Dani spat. “And from what I’ve seen of witches, I don’t want to be one! Treating people like this just because you can. You’re nothing but a monster!”

Kat crossed her arms, her amusement turning to anger in a flash. “You little creep! Fine, I’ll be a monster, then! You don’t deserve to be a witch! I’ll take my present back and make you a slug!”

“You know you can’t do that, Kathryn,” said their mother as she materialized next to the bickering siblings. “The boost was only for your first spell, and you can’t have two first spells. If you want to perform that level of magic on Dani again, you’ll have to work for it.”

“But Mom!” Kat whined. “I’m eighteen! Don’t I get more of a choice?”

Her mother shook her head. “You already made your choice, dear. And you’re not that old by witch standards. Now, you must live with the consequences for a while.”

Expressions of rage and frustration crossed Kat’s face before she threw her hands up with a shriek and stomped off to her room.

Dani couldn’t help but stick her tongue out at her sister’s retreating back, taking some glee at the juvenile gesture. After some thought, she asked, “If I’m still a girl when I turn eighteen, will I get a witchday party, too?”

“Of course,” her mother replied.

“Can I use my first spell on Kat?”

“You can, if you still want to.”

“Why wouldn’t I want to?”

Her mother simply shrugged. “Two years is a long time, long enough to change your mind.”

“Change my mind!?” Dani gave a humorless laugh. “I don’t think so. I’ll make her pay for this.” Straightening her back, she marched off to the party.

Behind her, her mother mumbled to herself, “We’ll see.”
1552332111.title: More Of An Argument Really

choices: Dani spots some of her friends
15523321111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

Dani glanced around, trying not to cringe away from everyone. Remembering how these people had watched dispassionately as she was transformed against her will kept her from getting comfortable. Now and then, women she didn’t know approached her, congratulating her on her sixteenth. All seemed eerily normal, no cage, no casting spells, no talk of witches. Even the banner no longer mentioned a “witchday” but only read HAPPY BIRTHDAY, KAT AND DANI!

“You’ve grown so fast, my dear,” gushed one middle-aged lady in a purple flowered dress as she emerged from the crowd. She gave Dani a one-armed hug as her other hand expertly kept her drink from spilling. “Your mother must be so proud to have such a lovely daughter.”

“What are you talking about?” Dani answered. “You know I didn’t grow up like this. You were there when my sister-”

“Ah-ah.” The woman cheerfully silenced the girl with a finger to her lips. “We mustn’t talk about such things, right now. Your mundane guests have started to arrive.”

“Mundane?”

“Oh, you know, humans.” The woman leaned forward to whisper. “Non-magic. We can’t have them finding out about us. They wouldn’t understand.”

Dani nodded, backing away slowly. “Okay. Um, makes sense.” It struck her as odd that she was clearly no longer included in this “mundane” category. “Well, I’d better go greet them. Pardon me, uh, ma’am.”

Smiling, the woman raised her glass and gave her a wink. “Just call me Helena. And I’ll see you again, soon, Dani.”

What did that mean?
15523321111.title: Meeting Another Witch

155233211111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

Suddenly, Dani’s heart jumped when she spotted two of her friends, Randy and Craig. The three of them had grown up together, playing basketball and video games at each other’s houses, sharing all kinds of experiences. How would they react to Dani’s change of gender? With great trepidation, she approached them from the side, careful not to get their attention until she stood a couple of steps away. “Uh, hi, guys,” she greeted softly with a small wave.

Both boys turned. Their eyes went wide, and for a moment, Dani feared they would make a scene. Instead, they did something worse.

“Dani!” Randy smiled, a slight blush coloring his cheeks. “Happy birthday!”

“Thanks?” Dani responded with some confusion. “So…notice anything different about me?”

The two boys shared a puzzled look. Craig took the first stab at an answer. “Um, well, I don’t think I ever saw you in makeup and a dress before.”

“Really?” Dani asked hopefully. Did someone actually detect the craziness going on right now? Maybe they thought Dani was still a boy and that he was cross-dressing or something. Maybe their lack of a reaction was just to be polite.

“Sure,” Randy piped up. “You’re usually more of a tomboy.” Reddening further, he blurted out. “B-But that doesn’t mean you don’t look nice! I-I mean, you look especially nice now! More than usual! And you usually look nice! That is, here’s your present!” Ducking his head, he shoved a carefully wrapped package into Dani’s stunned arms.

Dani automatically took the gift. After a pause, she said a quiet “Thanks” before hurrying away. Behind her, she overheard Craig snorting in amusement, “Nice, dude. Not awkward at all.”

This took a backseat to the more pressing issue. “They don’t remember.”
155233211111.title: Recognition, or not

1552332111111.content:
(Originally written by DarkLuke on CYOC.net)

Dani rushed upstairs as fast as her heeled sandals would allow her to, ran inside her bedroom and subsequently locked herself inside. Her face was red and her thoughts were muddled, as she was embarrassed beyond belief that her best friend of sixteen years apparently now had a crush on her. She laid Randy's birthday present slowly down onto the floor(The fact that it was now his birthday as well instead of being another two months away was another disturbing fact that he'd have to get used to) and when she looked upwards at her new reality, Daniella sighed with relief. Like Mom had implied a couple of minutes ago, Dani's room had not been altered very much. The walls were still white. They weren't painted pink or lined with frills and lace. His bed wasn't filled with stuffed animals. There wasn't even a vanity table in the corner. For the most part, it was still the same old room that Dan had grown up in. He was relieved to see that his video games were still lined up against the wall, his basketball hoop affixed right above the bookshelf. His old Green Army Men were still standing at attention right above his bed, the same ever since he was a kid, In fact, Dani couldn't really notice very many changes at all. It seemed that the only major alteration from Mom's magic spell was her clothing drawer.

Dani opened it, briefly rustling through her new wardrobe. She picked up her school uniform- Dan and formerly Kat attended Catholic school, which in light of the fact that they were from a family of witches now seemed ironic- and stared at it. The crisp white shirt was now a few sizes smaller and cut for a girl. Dani rolled her eyes at it and the black skirt, and below them found a baseball shirt and another one that as Dan he had got for Christmas back when Skyrim was popular.

“So apparently I am a tomboy” she thought. “If I have to be a girl for six months, at least it's nice to hold onto my boyish personality”.

Then another thought entered her mind.

“But I'm being forced to do this against my will. I hate it!”.

Dani squeezed the bridge of her nose to calm herself down. It didn't do anything, but at the moment she felt that it might help her, and it did.

She turned around and stared for a moment at Randy's present. It was wrapped in emerald green paper, which was Dan's favorite color. Did little lovesick Randy know that piece of trivia and wrap it up specifically because it was Dani's favorite color too? Dani didn't have time to ponder this question or open the present as she saw her mother somehow phase- phase- right through the locked door.

“Daniella” she stated in her sternest mom voice, her hands on her her hips, Dani noticing that one of the hands was holding a magic wand: “that was very rude of you to do, young lady. Randy and Craig are your friends, and they took the time out of their day to be here. I want you to go downstairs and apologize for blowing them off.”

For a moment, all Dani could do was stare at her Mom. Magic and witches were one thing, but what just happened was straight out of a movie or a comic book. Phasing was something that Kitty Pryde or The Vision was supposed to do, not moms.

“What the hell?” was all Dani could mutter out, her arm outstretched to indicate what was upsetting her. She winced once she realized how bratty her voice sounded. “Just like Kat” she reminded herself.

“I cast a spell to make myself intangible” Mom answered matter-of-factly.

Dani looked dumbfounded.

"You know, Daniella, running upstairs to your bedroom and crying is about the most girlish thing you could do. If you're trying to hold onto your masculinity, you're doing a bad job at it."

"Mom! You just phased into my room! Now I'm going to paranoid for the rest of my life that I'll never have any privacy again!".

The face of Rachel King softened somewhat. Dan was taking all of this much worse than she had expected him to. She sometimes took for granted that Mundanes like her son weren't used to the world of witchcraft where transformations were simply a matter of course, no different than a hazing ritual at a frat or sorority. She gently put her free hand on her daughter's shoulder.

“Listen, I know how much of a shock this is, but I will be there to pick you up every step of the way, Dani. What is it? I can't help that Kat chose you to transformation, that but is there anything else that I could help you with?"
1552332111111.title: It's My Birthday, And I'll Cry If I Want To

15523321111111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

Dani thought it over for a while. “Can I ask you to do something to Kat?”

Her mother gave her a look.

“Yeah, didn’t think so. But can you blame me for asking? She destroyed my life completely. Even my friends don’t remember me as a boy. Kat has to pay somehow.”

Rachel sighed, settling down on Dani’s bed and beckoning her to sit next to her. “You two have always been like this, always arguing day and night about even the smallest things, holding grudges and never forgiving. I’ve often wondered why you couldn’t be nicer to each other.” She rubbed her daughter’s shoulders in an attempt at a soothing gesture, but the girl ignored it.

“Maybe because she thinks of me as some kind of inferior Mundane that she can treat like a lab-rat?”

“That isn’t true, Dani,” her mother said. “Well, not entirely, at least. Your sister’s motivations are-” She shrugged. “-rather complex. And not completely malicious.”

“Like that’s supposed to justify anything?”

“No,” Rachel admitted. “But if you could understand her better, perhaps you wouldn’t hold this against her so much.”

Dani let out a frustrated huff and fixed her mother with a glare. “Fine. Want me to understand? Help me understand, then. Tell me what I should know about her. Give me your best shot.”

A twitch of annoyance flickered over Rachel’s face, and Dani worried for a moment that she had pushed too far. However, the witch answered calmly. “That’s for you to discover for yourself. If you really want to know, your sister’s room is right next door. You can ask her yourself, if you can manage more than two words without a fight.”

Fat chance, Dani thought, but she backed down anyway, knowing she would get nothing more on the subject. Still, the mention of her sister’s room brought another disturbing revelation. Only a single wall stood between herself and her tormentor. If her mother could phase through her door anytime she liked, what would stop Kat from doing the same in the middle of the night?

“Um, if I can’t ask you to punish Kat, can I ask you to make this room magic-proof?” At Rachel’s questioning look, she clarified further. “You know, like a magic-free zone or something. I don’t want any magic in here, no phasing through walls, no magical spying, nothing.”

Rachel nodded. “I think I understand. Very well. I can set a ward around this room that will be tied to you alone. Only your own magic will work inside it.”

“Hey, I said no magic!”

“It’s the best I can do. Besides, you can still choose not to use that option. It will be up to you.”
15523321111111.title: A Safe Space

155233211111111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

Dani relented. “Okay. Thanks, Mom.”

Standing up, Rachel lifted her hands and chanted a complex series of syllables. A network of glowing lines appeared along all sides of the room including the floor and ceiling. Turning to Dani, she said, “Hold out your hand.”

Trying not to shudder, Dani obeyed. Her mother took her hand and pressed a finger to the middle of her palm, causing a small circle of arcane symbols to manifest around the spot. Just as quickly as they appeared, the mark on her hand and the lines on her room vanished. For Dani, a sudden wash of input flooded her mind, making her shiver.

Rachel sat back down on the bed, making Dani gasp.

“Are you alright, honey?”

Dani looked at her wide-eyed. “I…I felt that!”

“Well, the spell does cause a warm sensation, but it’s harmless. It usually fades within a few minutes.”

“No! I mean I felt it when you walked over here and sat down.” The girl hugged herself and stared at her belongings with new fascination. “In fact, I can feel everything in this room! My bookshelf, my bed, everything, I can feel them even when I’m not looking at them. It’s so weird!”

Rachel peered at her. “Hm, now that is unusual. Your hidden talent may have to do with your belongings. Some form of psychometry, perhaps? I may have to study it later to be sure. In the meantime, as long as it’s not debilitating, you may simply have to deal with this, for now. Can you do that?”

Closing her eyes, Dani explored these new sensations. While strange and unfamiliar, it wasn’t uncomfortable or painful. It was more like having another limb or bodily extension. Focusing on the wall between herself and Kat, she could actually detect where her side ended and her sister’s began. Surely, if Kat tried to get in, she’d be able to sense it immediately.

“I guess so. Thank you for this.”

“Anytime, sweetie. Now let’s get back to your party, okay?”
155233211111111.title: One With My Room

choices: Dani's Mom Finds Them And Tells Them There Is Cake
Dani's Mom Finds Them And Isn't Happy About Her Being Barefoot
Kat Finds Them And Wants To Make Trouble
1552332111111111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

For the second time, at least as a girl, Dani made her entrance. To her relief, the guests welcomed her into their circles as if she had never left. Like before, she received a few more compliments about how much she had grown and how lovely she was. Having had a bit more time to resign herself to this current life, she took it all a bit easier than last time, even managing to smile and say thank you.

Despite her mother’s earlier command, she took her time before rejoining her friends. How could she just pick up where she left off without knowing where she had left off in the first place? Randy’s crush made things even more awkward. Still, avoiding them the whole time would probably be a bad idea, so she forced herself to approach them once more.

“Hey, guys,” she greeted, picking at her skirt. Taking a breath, she met their eyes and blurted out, “Sorry about running off like that. I’m just so embarrassed.”

“Embarrassed? About what?” Craig asked. “Um, not that you have to tell us if you don’t want to.”

Dani straightened up, deciding to go with a bit of honesty. “No, it’s alright. It’s just, I’m not used to dressing like this. It’s just so girly.”

“Well, it works for you,” Randy said. “I mean, you’re a girl, so it’s okay. If anything, it looks much better on you than it would on me.” Craig snorted with laughter, and Randy turned red again. “No, I-I mean…I would never…Ugh…”

Taking pity on the poor boy, Dani mustered up a giggle and smiled. “Guess I can’t argue with that. Thanks. I’m just glad you’re both here.”

From there, conversation grew more relaxed, and Dani was able to chat with her friends like before.

“Uh-oh. Here comes your sister,” Craig whispered.

Looking over her shoulder, Dani saw Kat entering the room with her mom close behind. Clearly, she had been given a talk of her own. One could only guess what had been said. Kat and Mom seemed to be all smiles with the guests, exuding a sunny kind of normality that in no way matched their true nature. Is that how I’m going to be? Dani wondered. All fake smiles and dark secrets?

“It’s not fair that she has to share the same birthday,” Randy grumbled. “For once, I’d like to celebrate your birthday without having to include her.”

Dani felt her heart warm at her friend’s support. That was one more thing that had stayed the same, their overall dislike of Kat. Little did they know just how much reason they had for doing so. “Let’s just go out to the yard and pretend she’s not here.”

So, the three friends moved out to the patio out back. For a while they talked some more, but they soon migrated to the portable basketball hoop that Dani’s father had erected years ago. Craig picked up the ball, and the other two automatically got into position. However, Dani discovered quickly that she could not play basketball in heeled sandals, so she kicked them off and kept going in bare feet. Their game went on for half an hour before there was an interruption.
1552332111111111.title: Back To The party

choices: Dani Goes Back To The Party
Dani's Mother Comes Out Looking For Her
Skip To The End Of The Party
15523321111111111.content:
(Originally written by tily9 on CYOC.net)

“So, what are you three idiots up to, now?”

“Oh no,” Craig groaned as the game screeched to a halt. “It’s her.”

Sure enough, there stood Kat with her arms crossed and a smirk on her face. “That’s right. I just had to make sure you two clowns weren’t out here molesting my sister. Especially you, Randy.”

Randy choked and turned red. “Wha-Why me!?”

“I saw the way you look at her. It’s so obvious. And now, you’ve got her bouncing around playing basketball while you steal glances at her body. You’re such a pervert.” Kat turned to Dani. “Word of caution, sis. That dress wasn’t made for jumping.”

“Kat, shut up!” Dani snapped. Just when she had managed to forget about her situation, Kat had to remind her in the most insulting way possible.

Her sister gave a wicked laugh. “Hey, I’m just looking out for you. You have no idea how boys think.”

“Of course I do!”

“Oh really,” Kat grinned. “And why is that?”

Dani only just stopped herself from shouting, “Because I’m a boy!” Was Kat really trying to trick her into blurting out their secret? What good would that do? “Just go back inside, Kat,” Dani growled.

To her surprise, her sister only nodded. “Fine. But keep in mind. Things aren’t the same as they were. Be careful of your so-called friends. You’re not like them anymore, and pretending you are is just going to bring you pain.”

With that, she went back inside.

“What a psychopath,” Randy said. “What did she mean by all that?”

“Nothing,” Dani answered softly. “Like you said, she’s a psychopath.” Keeping her eyes down, she went to pick up her sandals.

“Hey, aren’t you gonna play anymore?”

“No, you two go on. I just…need a break.” Dani slipped her sandals back on and sat down on one of her mom’s garden chairs, watching her friends continue their game. Had Randy really been ogling her? Or was Kat simply playing with her head? Did it really matter if he was? After all, she knew Randy pretty well, and he was a nice enough guy. Surely, a basic crush was harmless, right? Nothing could ruin their friendship.

Just soft spoken as though there were an innocence hidden behind them as she grins at you now and again in between.

Your bedroom window is shut with the black curtains drawn. It's dark in here, all except for the light peering in through the sides. One vertical beam casts some light on Kat's face, allowing you to see her still mouthing the words as they get ever so slightly louder and then ever so slightly quieter as though someone were fiddling with the volume controls on the radio.

Suddenly the window slams up and open and the curtains billow about as a gust of wind enters into the strange and awful scene. The afternoon sunlight comes crashing in more and more as your curtains change from thick and black to thin, white and frilly edged with just a hint of pink around about the edges. The floor boards creak and moan and this time it sounds like you're in the cargo hold of an old wooden sailing ship. In fact the room does feel like it's slightly rocking from side to side now but only just slightly.

Then your rock band posters shake about as though an invisible force is tugging at them from below. The tacks and tape come loose as the stress of it finally gives away to your posters falling one by one to the floor. They flatten themselves up and as Kat steps to one side they go swishing quickly beneath the lower crack in the door. The tacks come bumbling after them and sneak away.

"Hey!" you protest. "You've got no right to come in my room and start ripping the place to pieces!"

She merely grins at you once more and continues her magical chant.

Now the room stops swaying and instead begins to slowly spin about you as a wave of dizziness overcomes your senses. Your vision blurs too much to make out a single thing of what's happening anymore but you hear creaks, pops and snaps. You can only imagine what she might be doing to your furniture right now.

The blurry images around you seem to be getting bigger and you feel a funny feeling in your crotch.

Your vision returns but the room is spinning around too fast now to make heads or tails of what's what. All you can see that's only slowly spinning in the same counterclockwise direction is a misty pink cloud all done up in slow motion spiral, starting from somewhere down at your feet and growing wider and wider as the trail of pink smoke reaches high up to the ceiling, filling almost the entirety of your room.

The lower edge of the spiral cloud stops producing pink misty smoke and you see it slowly make its way around and around you up towards the ceiling like a large snake retreating up into the tree tops. As soon as the last trace of it vanishes the room violently stops and the floor boards creak even louder this time, ending in the loud clashing of wood, trailing off into dead silence. You feel a horrible tugging downward upon your body. It's as though the bottom of your shoes had become like strong magnets pulling you snugger into your shoes and securing you firmly in place, unable to unglue your feet off the floor.

The sudden stop of motion makes the rest of your body sway ever so slighly for a moment until you can finally get your bearings.

You look around and see everything in your bedroom has been redecorated to that of a little girl's. White canopy bed, tiny pink dresser, book shelves now painted white with pink trim and stuffed to the gills with dolls and toy animals. You close your eyes, not wanting to look down and see but the curiosity is too strong so you open them again and gaze slowly downward, down past a little white cotton play dress, skinny little girl legs and white sock covered feet stuffed snugly in a pair of shiny black flats.

Your sister isn't whispering the magic words anymore. She's just standing there so tall over you with a huge smile on her face.

"Kat... very funny Kat. Very funny... but change me back," you demand hearing a squeaky little girl voice in your ears. "If you don't change me back right now, I'm telling mom."

She shakes her head no and somehow her smile gets even bigger as she walks right up to you, bends over, grabs your right cheek and gives it a playful wriggle. As this happens you feel a strange tug at the back of your hair and feel the slight tickle of something grace it's way across your back.

Curious, you reach up and back there and retrieve a single auburn pigtail ending in a pink bow.

She lets go of the side of your face and straightens up and says,"Mom wouldn't believe you and neither would dad. Do you know why? It's because this is a reality changing spell. They'll only ever remember you as their cute little girl. Don't worry. The first time it only lasts maybe a couple of days... a week at most but then you'll change back. At least... that's what the book says. If the spell gets cast on you a second time it'll last even longer. The more it's cast on you the longer you'll stay a girl until... if it gets longer than a month, you'll never change back. Do you get my hint, little SISTER? Consider this-" she says and retrieves the book that had been tucked under her arm. She waggles the black book down at you tauntingly and continues on. "You'd better start treating me nice from now on or you can just get to spend more time like THIS."

She snaps her fingers and suddenly you feel less pressure drawing your shoes to the floor. You wriggle a foot to confirm it - she's freed you now.

"I'm sorry already, okay? So please change me back. Can't you see how ridiculous this is?" I asked.

She smirked and said,"You only think so because I let you keep your boy brain. Maybe you'd rather be a dog or cat instead? Huh? But at your age you'd just be a little puppy or kitten. I can't undo the basics of this spell - age and sex. However I could turn you into another species if you'd like. You want that? I bet you wouldn't last a minute being someone's kitten, being forced to sit in momma's lap for hours and hours and when you least expected it too. Just to be snatched up off the floor and placed there trapped in her lap. So... what do you say, little sister?"
15532222222222222.title: Oh How Humiliating!

1553222222222222222.title: Something else

15533.content:
"Well," his sister begins with pure evil in her voice, "now what would best fit you. Should I turn you into a girl...nah, that means you'd be up for my powers too. What about an animal? Yeah, I've wanted a new hamster for years. Yes, I'll think I'll make you a hamster."

She points her wand to him and tries to project her powers...only to hear a popping noise, and nothing happen. Dan guns it out of the room. He has no idea where to run. Somehow, he ends up in his parent's bedroom. He slams the door, locks it, and in a fit off Bugs Bunny inspiration grabs the nearest piece of heavy furniture and drags it in front of the door. His parent's look at him as if he's crazy, but somehow the industrious boy manages to haul a rather large dresser in front of the door. She then turns to his parents who then look at each other.

"Is your sister taunting you again?" As if finding the situation rather sweet.

"Mom!" Dan yells, "Kat...Kat..." Dan can not calm down. He keeps going over the event in his mind, and realizes nothing really happened.

"Your sister tried to turn you into something, didn't she?" His mom suddenly states as if nothing was wrong. "Well, you do sort of have it coming to you, you know you've bothered you're sister for far too long..."

"What do you mean turn me into something?" He yells.

"Dan, don't yell!" His dad states. "And move the dresser back."

"I think he should know." She states as she looks to her husband for a second before turning back to Dan. "Your sister is now a witch."

"A witch?" He says.

"Yes," his dad takes up. "A Cauldron stirring, pointy hat wearing, broom ridding, popular movie series starring in witch."

His mom gives his father a look, to which he just shrugs. "Hey, just telling it as it is."

She then looks to him. "I'm guessing she performed the spell wrong...why did you run though?"

"I don't know."

"You can sense her abilities. Doesn't really mean you can do anything about it." He states.

"So, what, I am just suppose to do...let her turn me into stuff?"

"You could make up...you've been a bad little brother." His mother states.

Dan's heart sinks. He feels anger build, then collapse. He feels tears come to his eyes, but every amount of mainly-ness in him to hold it back as years and years of stress come to the surface and force its way out as he yells...

"Bad little brother...bad little brother! You stood by when I was five, when she pushed me into the pool when I couldn't swim. When I was seven, I wanted to have a birthday party only for her too say no, and you caved in to her tantrum, when, just last month, when I said I needed a new jogging suite for the team, and she said that she need money for... for some crap, and you told me to quit the team so you could...do whatever for her!"

Suddenly, a knock comes to the door.

"Oh, Dannny...don't you want to come out and play?"

"You know what!" He yells. He inches his way in between the a wall and the dresser's new position. He then nearly pulls a muscle pushing the dresser away from the entrance of the door. He then unlocks and opens the door and looks to his sister. "You know what?" He starts to his sister's devious looking face. "I don't care any more I'm leaving...You can have this place...and them! I at least half liked you."

He turns from his sisters stunned face and starts down the stairs.

"Hey wait a minute." Kat starts realizing something. "You're not getting off that easily!" From memory, she recalls the words from the book (correcting for the pronunciation mistake from earlier), while waving her wand. A powerfully dark feeling passes threw Dan. The feeling of dread is instantly replaced with odd feelings threw out his body. He can't figure out whats happening. There is no pain, just his nerves in his body seeming to identify things differently. In some area, they seem to pick up more pressure,and in other areas less. He feels himself become unstable as he walks down the stairs. He tries to fight it but finds himself unable to do so. Then...
15533.title: False Start

155331.content:
Everything goes dark, and he looses all feeling threw out his body. Only the feeling of solid rigidity remains. He looses the ability to walk, or even track where he is. Instead, he begins picking up a new new feeling. He feels some sort of heat, which instinctively drawls him in. He quickly looses the ability to think, to tell time...no...he keeps the ability to tell time. But the manor is different now. He finds that this new heat source, this drug seems to move at regular intervals. Its missing presence is missed on him. He instantly wants to retract into himself. Then, he beings to panic, to stress, only for the heat to slowly return. Then, every so often...he'll feel himself growing tired. He begins wanting to fall over, feeling himself begin to disintegrate. Then, he feels a powerful rush of material that he gorges off of, to the point where he nearly looses the ability to breath.

Meanwhile...

"Kat," her mother starts one morning, "I think a couple of months is too long to keep your brother like that."

Kat turns and looks to the Ficus in the corner.

"I think he looks rather happy. I'll make him a Christmas tree in December."
155331.title: Everything goes dark

155332.content:
Dan nearly falls down the stairs, only to just barely recover by the end of them. He feels a strain on his mind, but its more stress related than anything else. He sits up, only to feel...odd.

He looks down to himself. His body is slender now, his legs are hairless. But he's draped in a bunch of leafs, all fashioned into a rather odd looking mini skirt. To make things worst, he has breast. A quick reach below the legs reveals...very little. He then turns around, feeling his new long hair dance on his back. He tries to looks towards his sister, only to find a large step in his way. It forces himself to adjust his view, just in time to spot his sister at the top of the stairs. She smiles, then runs off.

Dan looks back towards the door. The front door is open, even though the screen door is closed.

"Crap." He instantly tries to will his body to move towards the door, but a sensation he's not familiar with overcomes him. He feels a part of his body beating furiously and his legs just seem to move off the ground. The motion seems somewhat tiring, but not exhausting. Its this that causes him to quickly realizes two things,

'I'm like two inches tall!' He first thinks. The second. 'I can fly...I'm a freak'n fairy!'

He ignores the problems and tries to put his new found ability to the test. After nearly a minute of trial and error, he manages to push himself forward, and towards the door. his speed seems to increase exponentially, something that scares him intently. He tries to slow, only to feel his altitude drop, but he finds his target, the hole in the top of the screen his parents told him to repair while Kay, the one who broke the thing, went out with friends. He aims for the hole, and in a burst of energy and speed, burst out threw the hole. He feels his wings hit the threads in the screen. It feels like knives going at him. It hurts bad and nearly causes him to crash into the ground. He barely recovers, but is forced to commit to an emergency landing just beyond the sidewalk and into the grass. He lands hard, but the grass acts as an airbag.

He passes out.

"Uhh, Dan...Dan...where are you?"

Dan wakes up as he realizes his sister is looking for him. She sounds genuinely worried. He can't help but think about the last time he heard his sister that way. Then, they both almost froze to death. Instinct from that day wants him to go towards her, but the giant grasshopper looking him over reminds him of his situation.

He jumps up, nearly flying into the air, only to be stopped by a giant plant behind him. In his dazed state, he made it below the bushes just beyond the thin line of grass beyond the sidewalk. He lands back to the ground, realizing for the first time his odd looking ballet style booties.

"I look like something out of a Disney movie." He states looking himself over.

He then hears Kay state, "Come on, I wasn't going to hurt you Dan...come on...this isn't funny."

Then he hears the grasshopper say, "Yeah, that bitch, that's what they always say. We're not going to hurt you, we're not going to hurt you. She alone killed six of my brothers."

Dan stares at the grasshopper as if he's just been told he's dying.

"Wha..what did you say?" Dan asks in his new, feminine voice.

"I said she's a lying murderer. And you'd be good to just get out of here."

Dan rationalizes the situation for the moment...axing the fact that his sister is a witch and turned him into a fairy.

'That's right...' he thinks, '...its like the Ferngully movie. She had the ability to talk to animals.'

She then looks to him. "You understand me?"

"Yeah, of course." The grasshopper states coming up to him. "I saw you break out of there and crash in the grass. That was a lousy landing."

"Yeah, it was." the memory of that brings back the pain in his wings.

He looks to the the insect, that's just bigger than him. "Thanks."

"Its all right." The insect then turns away, "Well, I'm heading off. I'm hungry you know, and matting season is right around the corner." He then hops off leaving Dan to think,

'Now what?'
155332.title: Huh?

Dan noticed her walk out of the house and call out again “ Dan where are you? Please come back. I Am sorry, we can work this out if you would just come here.”

he looked at kat and could tell that she was actually somewhat worried. Looking up at the sky you can see the approach of dark gray clouds and knew if that was rain it would make flying completely useless. He looked back at kat who was now walking around the yard looking for you. Carful to look where she stepped before she took it so as not to accidentally kill dan.

She stopped right next to you but didn't notice you yet and whisper under her breath “ what have I done?” then started to walk away calling out for you some more.

Deciding that you should forgive her at least only for now you concentrate again on flying and wince in pain as your wings are still a little tender from the screen door you tough it out and fly towards kat. As she is calling you you land on her shoulder with out her noticing and sit down as all the flying is starting to get to you. then say “ I am right here kat” in a low glum voice. You could feel her muscles tense up a little after you said that and then her look at her shoulder to see you sitting there. She reaches up to you and holds her hand out for you to climb on. You take a deep breath and stand up and walk to her palm where you sit down again she moves her hand carfully so as not to shake you to much. And says “ dan I am so sorry I just wanted to pull a joke spell on you. I didn't want you to run away because of me” you think back to some of the old memories you had with her and smile at the thought of the memory. You then say “ it is ok this time but I would prefer to be my old self before we continue talking about this.”

She walks inside and closes the front door. Then says “well I can turn you back into the dan you were before. I may be a new witch but I do know the reversal for all the spells that I do know, that one included. But I have a proposition for you before you decide to change back.

Every witch needs a familiar in order to be accepted into the academy that I want to go to. It can be any animal or creature so long as the witch creates it with her own power.

My proposition is you can ether stay here with our parents which you know how they treat you.” she points at a piece of paper on the counter seconds later words started to scorch themselves onto the paper she continued saying “ or you can sign this paper binding you as my familiar and get out of this house to see a world of....fantasy.”

a malicious smile spread across her face as she set you on the counter and said “the choice is yours brother but this is the only time I will ask you after that you will be stuck here with our parents.

Looking at the paper you decide......

15533211.content:
Deciding your parents have always been way to hard to deal with you walk over to the paper and look at it. In big bold letters it says “Dark Flame Magic Academy Familiar contract”

feeling slightly uneasy with the name of the school you pass it off as nothing and read it to see what it said. There were some parts about you getting some slight magic powers nothing that powerful, then a part about you storing power for your owner. Nothing seemed like you were signing your death warrant or anything like that.

You see a pen on the other side of the contract and walk over to it. You pick it up it was very awkward to hold seeing as it was just a little smaller then you were but surprisingly it was really lite. You put it down and look to kat who was just watching you struggle with it and ask “how am I supposed to sign that if I can't even lift the pen?” she smiled and giggled a little then pulled out an ink well and told you” dip your hands in this and put your handprints on the line.”

you walk over and dip your hands in the cold ink then walk over to the line and hesitate for a second then put both your hands on in. after lifting your hands the ink started to glow the glow started to spread across the paper, then the paper slowly lifted into the air and rolled up with astonishing speed ripping the paper you were standing on out from under your feet. You quickly started to flap your wings slowing the impact of landing on the table.looking up at the contract you watch as it just explodes into dust. It started to sprinkle down onto you and looked beautiful.

Kat then said “well now it is time to pack and get ready to go. We have three days tell we need to go.” she waved at you to come and follow. Deciding to go in style you run to the end of the counter and jump off into a swan dive then flap your wings midway down the counter and start flying at kat landing on her shoulder and sat down again. She looked at you then said “nice jump there” then walked off. Once in her room she got out a bag and started moving her clothes into it. You fly off her shoulder and land on her end table feeling a little more competent at flying now. Then sit down. While there it hits you you look at kat who is packing away and ask (more of a yell to you) “Hey kat I have a question? When we go to the school you are attending where am I going to sleep and you know live?” she stopped packing and said well familiars sleep in the same room normally but you can't really sleep on the floor now, you would probably get eaten by another familiar or something. So let me think.” she stood there pondering this then a look like she thought of a solution came to her face and she said “come on” and ran out of the room you flew at her as she started to make a B-line to the attic. In the attic she started looking around, moving some boxes here and there before saying “aha”

she picked up a box and took it back down the ladder and then opened it. Inside was her old doll house. It was wood with blue walls. It had little plastic windows with little cloth blinds in them and a little patio with a white picket fence. It looked kind of girly to you but you had to admit it was a nice place. she told you to go in and look around while she got some other things for it. You walk up the three steps to the patio and look at it then. Twist the door knob and walk in, it was kind of dark right now and had lots of open space because there was no furniture or anything in it. But it had dusty wood floors and you noticed the ceiling was about an inch above your head. Amazed at how big it was and a little frustrated at that fact to you decide this might not be that bad of a place to live in.

suddenly the house started to shake and lift into the air. It knocked you down but soon you were set down and the side of the house opened up with kat looking in on you. She says” so how do you like this place?” you say “it is not bad I think it needs some furniture but it could be fun to live in I guess.

She opened another box and turned it on its side revealing all the furniture for the place. there was the really nice doll furniture sets inside. There was so much stuff you would totally be able to fill your place now. Then she said “i am going to be packing over here you fix up that place the way you want it and when we leave we can tape everything into place so it will be ready for you when we arrive at the academy.

If you need help with anything I will be right there so just holler at me. With that she went back to packing.

Looking up at the tarantula you could see a drop of clear venom slide down its fang and fall to the floor. You didn’t know how you were holding it up in the air without trying but you weren’t complaining. You decided to give the same fate it was going to give you. Concentrating you think about fire appearing in your hand you concentrate harder and harder managing a small flame, you point the small flame at the tarantula with your mind you concentrate on pushing the flame out of your hand as hard as you could finally shooting the flame at the Arachnid in a less spectacular way then you envisioned it in your head. Slowly it starts to burn, Limbs Flailing helplessly in the air tell all that was left was a limp roasted corpse of a tarantula floating in the air. Suddenly it hit you like a sack of bricks. Your legs start to shake and you fell to your knee’s, you were completely exhausted. You couldn’t move even if you wanted to. And your vision started to go dark. Your muscles started to tense up so you wouldn't fall over. You sat there hoping nothing would happen tell you could move again.

A couple of minutes passed your muscles relaxed a little and you didn’t feel as tired anymore. You suddenly heard a noise, it was footsteps coming from just below you. The footsteps stop and you hear “Dan are you up there?” “you try to say “yes” but it wasn’t too audible. she says” I am coming up don’t try to scare me if that is what you are planning.” And climbs the staircase to see you down on your knees and a charred corpse floating in the air close to you. This worried her as she ran over to you to see what happened.

She got on her knees and carefully picked you up she pointed at the corpse and muttered something and the corpse fell to the ground. It felt like a heavy weight had been lifted when it fhit to the ground. You relaxed a little more as Kat ran down stairs and put you on the counter you sat there as she looked for something. Finally she pulled out a bottle of honey and put a drop in front of you telling you to eating it will help you recover.

As you were sitting on the counter. Some honey on your hand licking it she asks you “ did you get hurt or anything?

you said “no I was startled but I some how made the tarantula float saving my life.”

and she replied with “ ...and your first reaction was to burn it, nice job. No wonder you were so exhausted preforming spells without letting your power reserves build long enough for one, and also not chanting is incredibly taxing on your body.”

you said “really I would have never guessed.” you say as sarcastically as you can and then ask “By the way how does honey help me regenerate my magic?”

she says “ fairies are more attuned to nature magic so it would make since that eating things that are more naturally made would help regenerate your power.” she sits down next to you and starts up again “ well I am done packing all that I am taking and was in the mood to go to the mall to kill some time tell dinner. I was going to ask you if you wanted to come along seeing as you are my familiar now we should probably get along better then as brother and sister, don't you think?”

you still felt tired about the incident and could probably do with some relaxing at home but as much as you hate to admit that you are now her familiar she is right that you should probably get along better. After thinking it over you decide to...

155332112112.content:
It was a very uneventful trip back home it consisted of you and Kat talking the entire way. The only other thing that happened besides talking was a little girl barley even seven saw you. She pulled on her moms arm trying to get her mom to follow her to show her the fairy, she was pointing at you yelling “Look mama that girl has a fairy.” This startled you, you were about to fly off and hide when Kat muttered under her breath “relax Danni the mom can’t see you so you are safe.” This made you relax a little but curiosity got the better of you and you decided to crawl over to Kats hood and climbed in peaking out the back to look at the girl. The mom started yelling at the girl for being rude and pointing at others and the little girl started throwing a temper tantrum. This made you laugh a little, the rest of the way back home you stayed in Kats hood.

Arriving back home as Kat walked in you could hear your mom in the kitchen and you dad is on his computer doing some work. You mom peaks out from the kitchen door and says “Welcome home honey, dinner is almost ready could you do me a favor and find your brother and tell him to get ready for dinner. It should be ready in about 15 minutes. “

Kat takes off her hoodie and hang’s it on the coat rack then started heading up stairs. You fly out of the hood and catch up to her this time flying a little behind her so that you could stretch you wings, they were beginning to get antsy from being inactive so long. Back in her room you go to your doll house and walk in kat opens the house and puts the lights you asked her to buy inside. They were meant for working house display models and were battery powered. You and kat spent some time installing them into the house so they would work. about half way done your mom calls and said “ Dan, Kat dinner time.”

Kat looks at you and said “so Danni are you ready to show them the new you?”

You were getting more nervous as the anticipation was building and nodded. Taking a deep breath you fly to her shoulder where you have become comfortable lately. Kat grabbed a thimble she bought you that had a flat bottom and was kind of hard for you to knock over and you went down stairs.

Kat walked to the table where your mom and dad were sitting and talking. Kat sat down and you sat where you normally were but this time on the table. Your parents look at you and say “Dan is that you?”

You nod. An awkward silence looms over the table, it was horrible you felt more embarrassed then you have ever felt in your life you wanted someone to speak it didn’t matter who just so long as someone did. Your dad tries to break the awkward silence by saying “well son I guess I always knew you were a little bit of a fairy but now this is going a little too far.” Then he starts laughing at his own joke. Your mom chuckled a little at the comment but you and Kat stayed quiet. She filled your thimble with water and gave it to you.

After a few more bad jokes at your expense by your parents they started passing food around the table. Kat gave you a small salad and said this is really good for you, fairies have a herbivore specific diet. You might be able to eat small amounts of meat but it will most likely make you sick. Saddened by this you ate your salad fast trying to relax from all that has happened to you today.

You ate in relative quite as your parents made fun of your predicament as much as they could. You did get to explain to them why you are stuck as a fairy and your battle with the tarantula but they showed you little praise or anything on that subject. Once done you and Kat went back up stairs and installed the rest of the lights in your house then talked and watched some T.V. trying to avoid your parents as much as possible.

Lying on your bed getting ready for sleep you think this might be the best you and your sister have ever gotten along and went to sleep.
155332112112.title: see how mom and dad react to you being a famili...

choices: arrive at the school and get classes
1553321121121.content:
Finally the day came where you and Kat were going to school. You and your sister stood at the front doorway, your parents although still patronized you for becoming your sisters “fairy” familiar still wished you good luck and their best wishes. After all the hugs and kisses you perch yourself on one of her bags. She looks at you and asks “ So Danni are you ready to go?”

You look at her with a nervous but exited smile and nod your approval. She grabs the handle to the wagon with you on it and pulls a key of of her pocket, it was a big old styled key with a long shaft leading to a small bladed edge on one end, and a medal crest of what you thought was she schools logo on the other side. The key gave off a darker aura though it wasn't black it was dancing on the line.

Kat muttered some words quietly then pushed hard into the key hole of your front door. As the key entered the hole you saw the door begin to crack from the keyhole and as the cracks spread you saw a stone archway forming between the cracks. As the door finished cracking Kat turned the key and the front door shattered leaving the stone door, in the center of the door you saw a skeletal figure he looked at Kat with dark green glowing eyes and said in a booming voice “ present your acceptance seal.” Kat let the handle of the wagon go and did some hand gestures while chanting. Then clapped her hands together, as she slowly pulled her hands apart a small ball of energy with different sized spikes formed between her hands. She grew it tell it was as big as her head with a mystical rainbow pattern sparkling throughout it then she held it in one hand and presented it to the skeletal figure.

It looked at it then back at Kat and said “ your seal is accepted.... present your familiar.” Kat looks at you. You get the impression you are supposed to fly in front of Kat, you hesitantly start flapping your wings as the rest of your body tries to stop shaking from how scared you are. Once you are ready you begin flying towards Kat positioning yourself between Kat and the door you hover right in front of the skeleton guardian. He glances at you then opens its mouth and sucks in. you see a small amount of glowing dust fly off you and into its mouth. It looks back at Kat and states “ this is your familiar.... I am proud to be the first to welcome you to the dark flame academy, lady Kat.” the door then slides to the side and a forest with a dirt path presented itself.

you fly back down to the wagon and flop down on the bag. Trying to clam down from how scared you are, Kat walks through the door way pulling the wagon. As she passes the doorway her clothes begin to change going from a dark blue tee shirt to a white blouse and a blue jacket. And her pants shrink to a plaid mini skirt with long white knee high stockings and black shoes.

When you on the wagon passed a similar change happened to you. Only a green tank top with a crest of the dark flame academy formed where your leaf dress was and a small mini skirt formed to cover your legs to about your knees. But you did not gain shoes or socks.

As you passed through the door you looked back and saw a gate in the middle of the road with your parents waving their last goodbyes to you and your sister. Before the door closed. And you and Kat began your trek to the academy.
1553321121121.title: time to leave for school

choices: familiars should ask permition to give away master's things
15533211211212.content:
kat wasn't walking long before another girl came right up beside her toting a bag just like the one your sitting on, and immedietly began chatting with her. kat didn't want to be rude so she started a conversation with her.

"hi i'm kat, what's your name" your sister, or master now you were a little confused on how to see her, said.

"i'm carrie, i don't know much magic, i'm the first generation of my family to have magic power, i got the accseptance seal and was told to find a familiar, speaking of which he's right here." the girl now know as carrie said reaching into her pocket. she pulled out a small bundle of fur that when out streached you relized was and animal. the small furry creacher looked around, darted to the end of her had and jumpped off, it spread it's arms out and glided over to you on kat's bag. you relized now this was a suger glider, those marsupial pets that were like squirls. it moved up next to you and sniffed, you weren't scared of it but you were so facinated you couldn't hear the conversation, thogh you saw kat gesture to you. then a voice startled you.

"hi," a high piched squeak of a voice said, and you jumped you'd totaly forgotten you could talk to animals. " i'm kyle, i was a pet before i was a familiar, i've never seen something like you before, do you have any sunflower seeds, i'm hungery, hey what's that." the hyper creacher said before you had a chance to answer any questions, he darted into kat's bag and drug out a bag of seeds.

"hey, i don't think kat will like you doing that kyle." you said but the furry beast wasn't listining he was too buissy chewing a hole in the bag before carrie grabbed him.

"bad kyle, no." she said shaking her finger at him. you noticed the sad look on his face and couldn't help but feel sorry for him, you grabbed one of the seeds from the bag and flew up to give it to him. his joy was plain to see for you anyway as he chowed down on the seed. you flew back to kat and were startled by the angery look on her face.
15533211211212.title: walk and talk

choices: Kat gets all her class info and you don't meet anyone else
Kat runs into more people/something else
155332112112121.content:
You sat on the bag as Kat went back to her conversation, you noticed she was trying to keep calm around Carrie like she did not like the way she talked or acted. After a few minutes the conversation between the two died down. They didn't say that much and you could tell that Kat was trying to shoot down anything that Carrie said.

After about 30 minutes of walking with no conversation going on the four of you came to a clearing in the forest. There were many other students dropping off their bags. Kat walked up to a small creature with a clipboard standing in front of a large pile of bags and was writing something down when Kat walked up the creature looked up at her and said “oh welcome my lady, how may I be of service you right now?” you looked at him it was a two foot tall frog that walked and talked, it was dressed very nicely. But the image of the frog made you giggle because of how comical the frog looked.

Kat gestured to the bags and said “could you deal with these?”

the frog smiled and said “right away my lady” he pulled out a rope and tied it to each of Kats bags and then strung it through your doll houses windows then tied it off and cut of a small piece of it and gave it to kat and said “just leave that in your room when you get there and we will deliver your stuff there.”

you jump off the bag and fly to Kats shoulder you looked over and saw Carrie trying to get one of the frog people to help her with her bags to no avail, Kat started walking towards the other end of the baggage area then said “sorry for the mean look earlier its just that girl did not show me the proper respect she should have and she needs to learn that is a very bad thing to do here, but you shouldn't have given her familiar one of those seeds so I am still kind of mad at you for that.”

you ask “why was that a bad thing to do?”

she replyes with “giving things to people in this world is a way on saying lets be friends and until she knows and respects my superior rank to her I don't want to have anything to do with her. But you are my familiar so you don't need to show me the same respect think of it as meeting an acquaintance and seeing a best friend she doesn't know me so she should respect my rank, you are my familiar and we need to be like best friends for my magic to be most effective so our relationship can be more casual.”

you are curious and ask “what do you mean by she is lower ranked then you?”

she says “she is a first generation witch as you heard, right?” you nod at that and she continues “ I am a 12th generation witch our family is old and normally very powerful, few families have lasted this long as us because there are witch hunters trying to destroy our practices because we are hieratic's to their religion. But that is a story for another time, lets get our schedules and room assignment and I will also need to choose the type of magic I will be trained in. Then we can relax a little before dinner.”

you exit the baggage area and walk off towards a small town full of students of the academy. You then see a big building towards the back which you assume to be the actual school. Wondering what else awaits you there?
155332112112121.title: kat just dosn't like carrie

1553321121121212.content: So what happens now? Does Kat net someone else? Or does something else happen?
