15533211211212122.content: So what else could happen?
15533211211212122.title: something else

155332112112121221.content:
Darkness or something that felt that way hit you like a jackhammer. You looked around as Kat spoke with some friends who seemed very respectful. You notice that the other familiars are hiding behind their guardians, trembling with fear. You see black smoke but none of the witches seem to notice. "Sorry to interrupt Kat, but...." Kat glares at you and pushes you into the bag. You fly out and see the black smoke cone closer. You can feel the anger in it and you know Kat is in danger. Summoning all the magic and strength you have; you grab Kat and pull her out of the way. "Danni! What the hell..." But Kat didn't finish when a bald, bespectacled man appeared.

Though he seemed conventional, even ordinary, you feel power radiating from him. The witch students are staring, unable to understand how this man got in. "Now see here.." But the teacher turned to stone before she could finish. "I feel anger!" he grinned maliciously after making his statement. His voice revealed his true self. The girls backed away, but despite your exhaustion, you flew in front of Kat. You weren't going to let him hurt her. A few more teachers appear, fear visible on their faces. "I am here, little witchlings for a test!" he declared. The witches trembled before he fixed his eyes on Carrie's familiar Kyle. The smoke struck Kyle who leapt away, morphing into a giant hamster like beast. He turned on Carrie, growling. Her fledging magic enraged him further and she ran, hiding behind Kat. He turned his eyes on Kat and roared. A few fireballs from Kat enraged him further. He yelled as he made his way towards Kat and you acted.

How you did it, you weren't sure but you grew and flung him away. He growled at you, you roared back before launching a fireball of your own. The flame burned as it struck Kyle who screamed as he died. You bellowed at the top of your lungs. "That's what you get for attacking my girl!" The demon grinned, "There is the anger, little witch demon! Like me you are a demon. Let your anger flow against those who hurt you!" he grinned, the words pounding from the air rather than from his lips, hissing at everyone. You clutch your head dizzily. So much anger in you. Your parents, the witches, the tarantula all are your enemies. And Kat who...you pulled back, "No, not my Kat!" you bellowed, charging and punching the demon. He flew before hitting the ground. He rose quickly, anger biting at him. "You'll pay for that, witchling!" He disappeared as you gathered your thoughts. You are a giant fairy witch demob, almost 5 foot 10 or 177 cms. You feel anger as the witches back away from you. "Danni?" asked Kat, tentatively. "We need to go home!" you declare.
155332112112121221.title: Enter the Demon

1553321121121212211.content:
You turned to the teachers who looked completely lost. You realise quickly that the teacher turned to stone was clearly the principal. They weren't responding and it enraged you. Your eyes flashed as white steam surrounded you. Suddenly you feel something soft wrapped around you. You bite back a giggle but you can't suppress a smile. "Danni...maybe we should go!" she suggested. "Is class dismissed for the day." you demand of the two teachers. They nod, trembling at the sight of you. You take Kat's hand as you left. You feel this burning as if you are on fire. The giant fairy, the witch demon, the freak are all names you can hear in your head. And the voice saying them is the voice that has belittled you, your whole life.

That would change now. "Danni...Are you ok?" she asked, worried. You debate replying when a rude guy bumps you telling you to watch it. Before you can process it, he is dangling in the air, his throat in your right hand. "Danni, NO! He,s not worth it! Please Danni!" cries Kat. Tears run down your face as you let him go. He struggles for breath as you back away from him. "Danni...are you ok?" she whispered. It was all you could take. Between your transformations, demons and the tarantula, you can't endure anymore and you break down. "Danni, it's ok! It's ok, baby, I'm here!" declares Kat. You hold her as you hear the rude guy replies to his friend's enquiries with a response of "I have no bloody idea how it happened. One minute I' m fine, the next I'm choking!" After a good long sob, holding Kat, you begin to relax. "Excuse me." came a small voice behind you.

It's Carrie. Kat holds you to keep you from erupting and this time you do giggle as her fingers touch your ribs. "I...I'm sorry." Carrie stated. "We are twelfth generation witches, you are first, show us respect, little girl." you bellow. Kat wiggles her fingers into your sides and you burst with laughter. "It's ok, Danni, calm down!" she expressed. You can only laugh as she continues before a car blows up about 20 feet or 6 metres from where you are standing. "Kat, we...we should bring Carrie with us." you suggest, panting a little. "Good idea, come with us, Carrie!" she offers. "Yes, Kat. Thank you both." she replies, her voice demure and respectful. "Are you ok, sweetie? Sorry about that, I couldn't think of another way to calm you down." she apologised. "Just don't repeat it. We don't want to blow up any more cars." you reply.

You take the girls, your mind racing as you feel the anger return. You feel strange and strong jealousy towards Carrie for some reason. And Kat seems different somehow. More beautiful, more kind...perhaps even more wonderful. And the fact you had to share her with them made you angry. Especially the owner of the mocking voice. You look at the door of your House and you were mad. "It,s time for revenge!" you burst, letting go of the girls and crashing open the door. "Danni!" screamed Kat as you raced through the house. He was drinking beer on the couch when you knocked down the door. "What?" he spluttered. "You!" you roared all his jokes and years if verbal abuse ringing in your ears. Before he could speak, you
1553321121121212211.title: Dad's new fate

15533211211212122111.content:
released the white smoke. Kat and Carrie entered the room to see an exposed Shakira like winged woman, about 4 inches or 10 cms in height. Her male clothes were still in the couch. You sneered at him. "Now, who is the fairy?" you mocked him, sneeringly. You felt a savage pleasure at his humiliation. The years he treated you with disdain all over. You feel hands carefully applied around you. They don't inspire those unwanted giggly sensations. A kiss to your neck makes you moan. "Danni, its ok! I'm here!" she stated, her voice soft and soothing. You feel the anger leave you for guilt and pain. You try to hold back your tears, but another gentle kiss to your neck and once again you dissolve. "Shhhh! It's ok, Danni! I'm here!" she repeats.

You don't know how long you cried in Kat's embrace. You don't even remember spinning around to hold her. You just remembered how good it was to be loved. Your parents always belittled and shamed you. But Kat loved you and that was all that mattered. Eventually you did stop crying. Kat wiped your eyes and beamed at you. "That's my girl! My brave little Danni, smart, brave and tough!" she declared. You giggled a little, somewhat embarrassed but at the same time loving the compliment. "I love you!" you declare, surprised at how much emotion was in your voice. "I love you too, Danni!" she replied. You looked into those beautiful eyes and unwanted thoughts popped into your mind. You yearned to kiss those velvety ruby lips. She leaned in towards you and you reciprocate, before Kat pulls away. "Mum's home!" she stated, blushingly. Mum, the woman who should have nurtured and loved you. Mum, who called you a bad little brother, who said you deserved it. Mum, who never wanted a fairy to make fun if.

The fury seized you as you ran towards her. Kat screamed after you, but you pressed on. With Mum gone, you would have Kat all to yourself. And that thought fueled you as you burst into the kitchen. You see her, your heart filled with unnatural hate. She looked at you, sadly before dropping to her knees. "I love you, Danni. I am ready to die!" she exclaimed. Tears fell down your face at this unexpected declaration. But only for a few seconds. "I don't believe you!" you retorted. The white mist surrounded you as you ready to kill her. "I was a bad mother to you both. Please kill me without guilt, Danni!" she offered. You feel unexpected conflict and you hesitate long enough for Kat to enter, panting. "Danni, don't do this! Please!" she pleaded. Fresh tears drop your face. "She always hated me because I was born a boy! She never wanted me!" you cried. "I loved you from the first moment, Danni. But you rejected me. Each time, you saw my magic, it would repel you and you were disgusted by me. After a while, I stopped trying and became resentful. I blame myself for being such a bad mother." she revealed, pulling up her sleeves. Unmistakable scars striped across her arms. You stared, aghast. "I deserve to die! I live you both, Danni and Kat!" she declared, moving a sword to her throat.

Moving at lightning speed, you grabbed it and hurled it out; hugging your mother. "Mummy, don't leave us!" you cry. Kat runs in to join and a 3 way hug ensues. "Oh my poor Danni, I'm so sorry!" she wailed. "I never rejected you, Mummy!" you cried. The rest way was impossible to hear as years of frustration melted away. After you had all dialled down the tears, you heard a voice. "Hey, what about me!". cried your dad. The sight of her made the three of you and Carrie waiting by the door laugh. "I always knew you were a bit of a fairy, but an exhibionist too? Act your age!" you joked, to general laughter. You turn to Kat and asked "Since I can't be your fairy familiar, perhaps she can?" you say, pointing to your ex-father.
15533211211212122111.title: turned him into a fairy

choices: It's a new romance, lovemaking comes afterwards
155332112112121221111.content:
"That's a good idea, sweetheart! Well...I can't call you Dad anymore as the transformation has altered you from an ordinary human male to a fairy. So let's call her Lucibelle! Well Lucibelle, what do you think? Will you be my familiar?" she asked. "What? NO!!! I'm your father, not your pet and I demand..." "YOU DARE TO SPEAK TO KAT THAT WAY! I'll teach you SOME MANNERS!" you bellow. A giant Brazilian bird eating spider appeared out the mist, heading straight for Lucibelle. lucibelle squeals, unable to flap away as the massive creature bares down on her. Carrie screams as the beast flings webbing, bringing the fairy down. Lucibelle blubbers, squealing at the monster's approach. Kat hugs you again, you feel her plead with her embrace. The spider shattered within millimetres of Lucibelle who has wet herself.

You wave your hand and the bare fairy is free. "You have a choice, fly away or become Kat's familiar. Carrie will call her biological parents before we have dinner." you offer with a snarl with the word dinner. "I want to be a man again!" Lucibelle wailed. "Choose!" you demand as Carrie goes to call her parents. "I'm proud of you, Danni! You are a true witch, my child! Son or daughter, I will always love you." exclaimed your mother. "I will always love you too!" agreed Kat, holding you. "My angel Danni!" she added. You held Kat tight, your emotions in knots. Anger for your situation, guilt for actions, sadness over your mother's anguish and love...love for Kat. It struck you like a jackhammer, you were in love with Kat! But she is or was your sister. But the changes have removed most of your biological links. You are more like distant cousins than sisters.

You look into her eyes and she looks into yours. Your heart beats faster, you sweat and your lips quiver. You feel your womanly area more acutely down as it reacts to being in contact with Kat. Your chest leaves no doubt as to your thoughts. Kat closes her eyes and leans in. You don't hesitate to match her actions as you wrapped yourselves around each other. Your tongue gentles caresses her, her body quivers with delight. Your hands wander as if under their own volition. You have never been so happy in your life. "Hey!" screams the irritating voice of Lucibelle. It takes all of your self control to not blast the blasted fairy into smithereens. "What!" you snarl. "I....I accept being Kat's familiar." stammers Lucibelle, terrified of your rage.

"Dinner!" calls out your mother. You take Kat's hand as she passes Lucibelle the contract. As you sit down, your wings retract of their own volition. Kat sits on your lap as she passes the plates to your mother, Carrie and you. You beam at her lovingly as she passes you your plate. She beams back, biting her lip a little, shyly. Lucibelle is grumbling about her situation. You cut her off before your anger blows her up. "The demon who turned me will be back! We need more protection. I think that Kat and I should magically adopt Carrie, so we are safer." you suggest. Your mother nods at the suggestion. "Sounds like a good idea, babe. If Carrie agrees, that is." All eyes turn to Carrie who nods. "So I will have like 3 Mums?" she asked.

"Two mothers and fathers! I will be your father! And Kat your mother! It is an ancient..." but Kat pokes you in the belly and you are unable to finish the sentence. "Sorry darling, we couldn't risk any more giant spiders." she apologised. You whisper "Wait till I get you alone, my live!" you tease. She squeals a little before resting against you Your mother raises an eyebrow, querying the closeness between you. "Should we tell?" you whisper to Kat. "Yes!" she replied softly. "Mum, there is something I have to tell you." you begin. Your mother shakes her head. "I already know, Danni. You and Kat have pair-bonded! It's not surprising, but please be careful. Otherwise I just want you both to be happy! I am assuming Kat will wait until you become a woman to avoid a Kaitlyn Hunt situation?" she enquired. Kat replies with....
155332112112121221111.title: good idea

1553321121121212211111.content:
Kat replies with “It's a new romance, lovemaking comes afterwards!”

Though you half expected it, the reply still bit at you! She spun around and planted one on your lips. “When we’re ready, princess!” she whispered in your ear. “So…what happens when I get adopted? Do I become part demon, too?” asked Carrie, tentatively. You shake your head. “No, Carrie. You will change from 1st to 13th generation witch. But perhaps that, I need to teach you both to how to fight magically!" you explain.

"But baby, you don't know how to fight!" she pointed out. You smile and reach behind your back. You, Kat and Carrie find yourselves in a training room. You proceed to display your skills, showing a variety of kung fu and karate moves that surprised them both. A sword appeared from the sky and you showed them your skills at parrying and defending. "Kat, darling, please shoot me with a fireball!" you request. "What! But you could get hurt or worse!" she cried.

"No chance of that! But try, darling!" you reply. Despite her reluctance, she shoots a fireball that you easily deflect. "Wow, that's so cool!" gasped Carrie. "I know! With this sword and my basic level of demon and witch skills, I am hard to stop!" you respond. "Really?" teased Kat, moving closer. "Yep!" you answer, not noticing that Kat's fingers have taken the claw movement. "And nothing can penetrate it?" she continued. "It would be very hard to eeeee HAHAHA!" you squeal, almost dropping the sword.

"Kat! You almost got us killed!" you roared, shocking Kat. "I'm sorry!" she exclaimed. "Never, ever tickle me when I am holding my enchanted sword! If it hits the ground, it will blast away anything in range! Sweetheart, you must be careful!" you explain, putting away the sword, and pulling Kat to you. "I...I couldn't bear it if anything happened to you!" you stammered. She replies with her lips. You enjoy this moment as you both express your new found love before Carrie interrupts.

"Sorry! But what about my adoption?" she asked. "You are sure you are ready for this, Kat, my love?" you check. "Let's do this, darling!" she confirmed. You took Carrie's left hand and Kat took her right. "Do you swear eternal loyalty to the family through pain, suffering and death? Till time spins away the cob of life and the stars fall to the ground?" you chant. "Umm…yes?" she replied. "And fidelity to your mother Katelyn Goode and your father Danielle Goode?" you continue. "Yes!" she replied.

Light fell upon her as she glowed from the inside. Kat gasped, but kept her hand in hers. A few more minutes of glowing passed before it was over. "What happened?" asked Carrie. "You are now a 13th generation witch! Welcome to the family, our daughter!" you respond. “Do I look different?” she asked. “You look exactly the same! It’s only genetically you have changed not physically! You are now biologically linked to both of us! Now you have a choice to make, Carrie! Do you want to get yourself a new familiar or train in magical defensive arts with us?” you offered. Carrie choose
1553321121121212211111.title: It's a new romance, lovemaking comes afterw...

15533211211212122111111.content:
Carrie chose to go shopping for a new familiar. “Okay, hold my hands, girls!” you offer. They took your hands and you disappear into the mist. You feel them press themselves against you, your new family. You felt happy, happier than you ever had. You land inside the magical mall; you had before. “There are many stores, here to choose from, Carrie! Pick the one, you like my little one!” you offer.

“Thanks Daddy!” she replies, happily. You feel oddly choked up to hear her saying Daddy and Kat hugs you. “The most beautiful Daddy in the world!” she whispered. She stops in front of the magical creatures store with the fairies trapped in the cage! “Ohhh! They look so sad! I want them! Can I, Daddy? Can I? Can I? Please?” she pleads, acting less like an 18 year old and more like a 5 year old.

“You can have one!” you answer. She squeals with delight, hugging you before racing into the store. You smile at Kat, who smiles back and you enter the store. The shopkeeper is scared of you. It’s not surprising as you are a demon, who is part fairy as well as a 12th generation witch. But you feel that familiar rage that you pen in. “I want a fairy! The prettiest and most powerful one, you have!” declared Carrie.

“Of course, Miss!” he responded, hurriedly taking out all the fairies he had to choose. He looked nervous and it was grating on your nerves. “Peace, mortal! I may be a powerful demon and 12th generation witch; but so long as you show respect to my wife and daughter, you needn’t fear me!” you proclaim, your voice cold. He freezes for half a second, before relaxing, processing it all.

“Yes, my lady!” he answers. Carrie examines each one. They all look hopeful, but one of them is positively gleaming. A red flame existed inside her which changed with colour. “I want her! Please Daddy, can I? Can I?” “Yes, Carrie! She’s yours!” you reply. “That’s fantastic! I love her!” exclaimed Carrie, reaching forth to hug the fairy. The fairy hugs her back, tears flowing down her little face. “Thank you so much, Mistress for rescuing me! I will be the best familiar you ever had!” babbled the fairy.

“I’m sure someone would have adopted you though! But I am so happy to have you too!” exclaimed Carrie. You look at Kat, who looks back worried. Carrie doesn’t know what happened to the fairies that weren’t purchased. “What she means, sweetie.” You begin, gently “is that some of these fairies are meant to be … well…part of the diet of some animals!” you explain.

Carrie turns pale, before crying, holding the fairy tightly. “Sweetie! What’s wrong!” you and Kat declare, holding the girl. “I don’t want the fairies to be eaten! I love this fairy so much…but I can’t bear the thought they will die! I want them to happy!” she wailed. You curse yourself for opening your big mouth. You turn to the shopkeeper who looks nervous again. “How much for all of them?” you ask, annoyed.

Carrie stops crying and looks at you hopefully. “Um…Well…” You reached into the air and throw him a sack of Spanish doubloons. “They’re from a ship that sank 450 years ago! Will that be enough?” you snarl. The greed on the shopkeeper shows, and he eagerly accepts. The fairies fly around Carrie, while the one she chose sat on her shoulder. “Is there anything else I can get you, ladies?” he grins. The anger fills you before you can stop it and you turn on the shopkeeper. “Avarice fills you, shopkeeper! Then enjoy your new life!” you cry as a cage appeared around him. He suddenly shrunk, taking the form of a fairy without clothes.

You pull back, horrified for what you did. “Well enjoy the gold!” you declare. You grab Kat and Carrie and disappear as the keeper squeals. You find yourselves back at the dinner table. Lucibelle was on her knees, begging your mother who wasn’t interested. “What in the world?” she gasped. “Carrie, you can take your familiar to your home. I will take care of the tribe!” you confirm. She grinned, hugging you both. “I love you Mummy and Daddy!” she declared, before you clicked your fingers. A portal appeared and she waved goodbye.

You whistle, catching the fairies attention. You wave your hands and the house shakes. You spread your hands and it stops. “There is a whole room for you, girls! Food, water and a dollhouse village as well! Stay there until Carrie calls on you!” you command. They flew up, happiness shining from their little wings. “What happened?” asked your mother. “Carrie wanted us to save the fairies, so I paid for them!” you reply, angrily. Your mother grinned. “Someone is a bit of a pushover Dad!” she exclaims. Kat giggled, cuddling you. “But she’s such a pretty Daddy!” she teased.

You turn red, glad at least you still aren’t angry. “What about me?” squealed Lucibelle. “You will live in the dollhouse; I stayed when I was a familiar! So…” you click your fingers; Lucibelle was now wearing a leafy outfit like you had. “Get going! Now!” Lucibelle flew up the stairs. You turn to your mother and Kat.

“I turned the shopkeeper into a fairy! It’s irreversible! His wife will wake up tomorrow and think he ran out on her! And then he will be sold! It was so stupid!” you reveal, shaking. Kat cuddles you, rocking you a little. “Baby, you panicked! It’s okay! You are still learning to control your witch-demon powers. You will get there! But for now, Mum, Danni and I are going to bed! And yes in the same bed!” she answered your Mother’s unspoken enquiry. “Just remember that Danni is a minor!” she reminded her as she took your hand and entered her room.

“This is our room, now, treasure!” she declared. She winked at you as she began to remove her clothing. Your heart beat faster again when you saw her completely exposed. She stood in front of you, her hands on her hips. “Like what you see?” she teased. “I said I’d get you back!” you threaten, stepping towards her. She squeals and began running across the room to get away from you. A quick play later, you have her on the bed; kissing her lips tenderly. “I hate being 16!” you whimper. “In two years, I will make you a woman! Promise!” she replied. You click your fingers and you are wearing as little as she. You pull her to you and you both fall asleep.
15533211211212122111111.title: shopping for a new familiar

155332112112121221111112.content:
You squeal as Kat wakes you up by blowing a series of raspberries on your navel. She starts grinning. "My giggling soul mate can't bear a few belly button kisses! Tsk, tsk, tsk!" she teased. "I'll show you belly button kisses!" you threaten as you chase her across the room. She squeals happily, her globes jiggled sexily as her chest bounced. You grabbed her from behind, wriggling across her sensitive ribs. She proved almost as vulnerable as you as she laughed melodically even after you pinned her down, exploring the crevices of her ribcage. You stop, grinning before flipping her on her back. She is still giggling, looking up at you. "Belly button kisses, eh?" you remark.

She explodes as you plant a series of your own kisses on her sensitive button. You made it quick though, as you quickly move your lips north to hers, sampling those velvety lips. She quickly reciprocates. You immerse yourself in your situation, not a stitch between you and her back against the bed. Your hand run down the length of her arms, yearning to touch her somewhere sensitive. She breaks the kiss and smiles at you. "We will take a shower together, before I get dressed and we go to school!" she states. Hiding your disappointment poorly, you reply "We get dressed, I am not going to school naked!" you point out. "But you have to go to your school sweetie, you are still in high school!" she points out, sadly. "I was a familiar, remember? We don't go to school! Besides I already fixed it, so I graduated early. If you want next year, we will be Yale girls!" you answer.

"And why Yale, princess?" she asked, teasingly. "Hillary Clinton is 7th generation witch and she has a secret witch sorority there! Harvard, Columbia, Cornell, Dartmouth and Penn don't!" you explain."What about Princeton and Brown??" she asked. You frown as she giggles. "We don't need to go to clown college! I'd rather go to MIT or NYU, then those reject snob factories!" you exclaim. She laughed at that, before you seized her, running full pelt with her in your arms. You find the bathroom and in seconds, you are pressed against Kat the warm water, running over you. "I love your blonde hair, Danni! It is so sexy! I have so many plans for it! And I notice someone is quite bare, somewhere very private!" You turn red at Kat's comment. The demon part of you kept you from having hair anywhere outside the top of your head. It also left you without periods, so you could impregnate but not be impregnated.

"I wonder what it feels like? Guess I will find out ob your 18th birthday!" she teased, turning around and pressing her cheeks against your area. "I love you, Danni!" she stated as she took the liquid soap in her hands. "I love you too!" you reply as you conjure up liquid of your own and begin massaging it on Kat's body. "Ohhh, God! I wish you were 18, Danni, so I could marry you!" she moaned. "I feel the same!" you declare, kissing the back of her neck. She turns around and rubs the soap against your belly. Your lips find each other as you express your feelings for Kat.
155332112112121221111112.title: Next Day

choices: Your ex father was trying to fight off Carrie's lovesick familiar
1553321121121212211111122.content:
"Breakfast time!" called out your mother. Kat smiles at you, breaking the kiss before you both finish. You grumble as you dress. Kat picked out a tank top and a white skirt for you to wear. She also teased you with her g-string undergarments. You feel slightly foolish in your tiny apparel at your height. Kat lifts your skirt, grinning. "Love the view, its breathtaking." she continues, eyeing your own g-string. "Why don't you just give in to me, my love? Then you can see every part of me!" you reply. She wrap herself in your arms. "The day after you turn 18, we won't leave the bed till you can drink!" she responds. "Ohhh! You're such a tease! Lucky I love you so much!" you whimper. "Love you too!" she replies, grinding and twerking against you, before taking your hand.

You hate this clothes, you would rather still be showering with the woman you were meant to be with. Carrie was there to greet you. "Hi magic parents! You have to see this!" she declared. What was it?
1553321121121212211111122.title: Mum calls out breakfast time

choices: Sense the other Kat needs you against Dan the Demon
15533211211212122111111221.content:
You could help but grin as Lucibelle was trying to fight off the romantic advances of Carrie's familiar. "Oh aren't they cute?" squealed Carrie. "I'm not a fairy! I am a married man! Leave me be!" cried Lucibelle as the red fairy continued to try her romance. "You are a fairy! You're not married, so there is reason to object! Carrie sweetie, what's your familiar's name?" you asked. "Furiya, Daddy!" she replied. "Furiya, Lucibelle lives to be tickled! She's crazy for it. If you want her, tickle her!" you advise the red fairy. "No! I am married, get out from me! Babe, help!" squealed Lucibelle as she flew away, Furiya in hot pursuit. "Tickle her below the back, she loves that!" commented your mother.

You smile despite yourself. "Losing your husband doesn't seem to bother you!" you observe. She shrugged. "I will just have to settle for being a hot widow! I think I will stick with women from now on, they're better in bed!" "Mum!" "Gran!" She smiled, pulling her tongue out at 3 of you. "So my 3 big girls are off to school, I take it! Danni, here is your seal. I enrolled you overnight. The teachers still haven't been unable to free the principal!" "But that was almost 24 hours ago!" you gasped. "The principal is an eleventh generation witch. The other teachers are only 9th generation, sadly!" she observed. You shook your head. "I suppose I need a familiar too, then. Maybe the shopkeeper is available?" you mused, slightly annoyed. "You can have one of my faeries, Daddy!" offered Carrie. " Thank you, sweetheart, but I think I already have the right one!" you remark.

"Well my loves, we better go! Furiya, Lucinelle, your guardians want you. Furiya returned, carrying an out of breath Lucibelle. Her face was red and she gasping in air, a forced grin across her face. "Thank you Mistress Danielle! You gave me good advice!" she declared. You all laughed at Lucibelle. Kat picked her up and rested her on her shoulder. "There will be time for fairy romance later, Lucibelle! Now its school time!" she declared. You whistled and a large morphed through the walls. Carrie gasped at the sight of the massive lizard. "Dani, he is magnificent!" cried Kat. "She is indeed, darling. I am calling her Susan after Mum!" you respond. Your mother Susan can't help but smile. "That's sweet, Danni! Well, off to school!" You help Kat and Carrie on the dragon, Furiya happily floating above Carrie's right shoulder, blowing kisses to an unhappy Lucibelle. You whistle and the dragon flies off.
15533211211212122111111221.title: Your ex father was trying to fight off Carrie...

155332112112121221111112211.content:
After presenting your seals and familiars to the skeleton and watching Lucibelle quail before Furiya comforted her, they found themselves at the school. The students were all milling around nervously, but they all gasped to see the dragon. You help your family off and whisper to your dragon familiar. He changed into a beautiful woman with red eyes. Kat's friends are watching you all as the frog servant genuflects and takes all your bags including Carrie's. Carrie is thrilled at the treatment she was now receiving as a 13th generation witch. "Hi, Kat!" declared a tall redhead, who bowed a little at the four of you. "Hi Nat! I take it you know my daughter Carrie and my fiancee Danni?" she asked.

Nat blushed a little, before nodding. "I...uh, yes!" she stammered. "You are eleventh generation witch?" you asked, commandingly. "Uh, yes, sir! I mean Miss! I mean..." You smile and shake your head. "You can call me Danni! A friend of Kat's is a friend of mine. But don't forget Carrie is our child!" you pointed out, your anger under in control, but threatening to come out. She nodded shyly as you all walked towards two other girls. They introduced themselves as Caroline and Maxine, both 10th generation witches. It was clear they had pair bonded, the way they were with each other. The topic soon changed to the fate of the principal. "They can't free her! And without her, the school won't open!" despaired Nat. You feel anger flaring, but a hug from Kat calms you down.

"But I just became 13th generation! I need to learn as does Mummy! Can you help, Daddy?" Despite their surprise, the other girls don't reply. Nat looks adoringly at Carrie, make you glare at her. She quickly stops, Kat whispers in your ear that it will happen regardless of your wishes. No matter what, Carrie was your child and nothing would stop that. You walk towards the principal in stone. She is close to the end as the weight of her stone body was crushing her. If she was not turned back soon, the magic keeping her alive would fade away. "Have you tried a stone draining spell?" you demand of the teacher who told you yesterday school was dismissed. It was clear that she was the vice principal.

She looked at you blankly as you hissed annoyed. You check the Headmistress, the spell was embedded deep. It would require a powerful series of spells, but you could not do it alone. "Attention, all girls that are either tenth generation or higher please make your way to the headmistress. I repeat all girls of tenth generation or higher to the Headmistress!" you call out, your voice bouncing off the walls. With yourself, Kat, Carrie and the three girls, only 4 girls stepped forward. All were tenth generation. You call out for first generation girls annoyed. 5 girls stepped forward. "Ok, tenth generation girls, you will need to adopt these girls as your daughters. Other than Max and Carol, who has pair bonded?" you demand.

After confirming there was none, you have the 4 girls pick a girl, while Max and Caroline take another. You recite the spell quickly and soon, there are 5 11th generation witches. With a sense that time was against you, you reluctantly gather your family and the others into a circle around the principal. Once the spells began, a scene reminiscent of Howl's Moving Castle began. You hear the music from it as the energy pulls and alters the stone. It worked and the principal was caught by the Deputy, breathing but unconscious. You take your girls and head to class.
155332112112121221111112211.title: The school

choices: it was time for water class
1553321121121212211111122111.content:
Clearly being part demon gas its negative points as the first class was ridiculously easy. Her questions about stance, flame intensity and heat manipulation were so simple that it was amazing the class was even taught. At any rate, you found yourself answering each question as the girls did not want to due to boredom. You left the class for recess, annoyed at the stupidity of the class. "Wow, that was tough!" gasped Nat. "Stupid class!" complained Maxine. "Yeah!" agreed Caroline, her right arm around Maxine. "My Danni knew all the answers!" declared Kat, proudly, kissing your neck. As always you moaned at her touch. "Daddy's very smart like Nat!" added Carrie. You liked the compliment but disliked the way that Carrie and Nat were looking at each other. You feared they might pair bond.

Your eyes widened suddenly as you cast a spell. "Those stupid bimbos!" you thought about the teachers as you accelerated your movements, tine was of the essence. The others stated at you, but you had to be quick. You heard Lucibelle ask Furiya, what you were doing. But you felt bumping, so you moved faster, pushing yourself to the limit while there was still time. Over and over, you chose correctly as you drove on. Your dragon picked up the spell as you both sealed it permanently. Kat caught you as you fell into her arms. You were sweaty and tired, the spell drained you heavily. She sang to you as you recognise an energy restore spell from the spell book in the room you shared with the witch you loved.

You feel replenished almost straight away, but still dizzy and you swooned a couple of times. Despite your weight, Kat helped you stay on your feet. The vice principal was there, shuffling her feet. You would have lost control but for the light headedness and Kat. "It was a protection spell! The demon was trying to enter, but Danni and her familiar stopped him! It was very brave!" explained Kat. Kat understood things so well. The pair bonding was taking effect. The ancient witch art of pair bonding was in many ways a biological as well as emotional bond between 2 witches. It was pure, true love binding two beings to each other. But it was real, uncast unlike a binding spell. It allowed a link between two people that would never break. It was a marriage in every sense of the word, save legal. And it meant thoughts could pass between each other. You could feel Kat's love, pride and desire for you. An ageing spell would not change her mind, though. Your 18th birthday was still too many months away and it pained you as you feel so much for her.

"So he can't get in?" asked the vapid vice principal. "No, Miss Pentecost, he can't!" you spoke, gritting your teeth. The stupid woman seemed to accept this as you left for recess. At the school, rare and non fattening fare was prepared for you. Lucibelle was fed lettuce and tomatoes by Furiya and seemed to accept her situation better. Of course, the good looks of Furiya may have had something to do with it. Nat and Carrie kept making googly eyes at each other, forcing you to glare at Nat, angrily. Maxine sat on Caroline's lap, as they ate and tickled each other. It was clear that your table was the popular one as it was elevated and in the centre. Since your lines were the oldest, it made sense. Two new girls sat at the table. Emily was the child of Maxine and Caroline. While her friend and possibly more, Willa sat next to her. Your dragon was sitting across the table, between Emily and Caroline. The frog waiters brought more food, each sumptuous. While you were all eating vegetarian meals, your demon side craved meat. But you were not going to indulge that anger. You would resist as long as possible.

"So what now?" asked Nat. "Sorry Nat, I don't follow!" asked Kat. "Well the demon guy will try to get us back somehow. How can I defend Carrie...I mean how can we defend ourselves?" she asked, nervously. Carrie beamed and you knew before it happened that it had started. Nat and Carrie had pair bonded and they had been together less than 3 hours. "I will teach you all! Carrie is our child and it seems Nat will be her wife!" you pause as both Carrie and Nat blush, before Nat gets up to sit on Carrie's lap to her obvious delight. "But the rest of you are family! So we will form a coven! Willa, invite your mother! After Water Class, we will spend lunch completing the rituals for coven formation. And we will protect ourselves and our fellow students from the demon." you declared. You looked across the table and you all agreed. The sounds of church bells and pianos rang throughout the dining hall and....
1553321121121212211111122111.title: Fire Class

choices: form the coven and use that magic
15533211211212122111111221112.content:
Time slowed to a stop. You cast a protection spell which protected your family and new friends. "What happened?" asked Kat. "Something bad! The demon has done something!" you reply. Nat moves instinctively in front of Carrie that irks you. Caroline and Maxine hug each other as do Emily and Willa. You squeeze Kat's hand with your right hand as you use you to left to divine a solution. Your wings extend, lifting you and Kat in the air. "Carrie, sweetheart!" you state. Carrie jumped while Nat's eyes darted back and forth

"I am leaving you in charge! Watch our friends, while Kat and I find out what's wrong!" you command. "Yes, Daddy! I'm okay, darling!" she tells Nat. You ignore your anger towards Nat and open up a door. Your dragon waits obediently with the girls and faeries as you two enter. You see the Demon and knock him to the floor. You know it wasn't the same demon, though this was his work. "Don't do this, Dan!" you advise your parallel universe doppelganger. He charged at you, but your fire was too strong. He recoiled in pain before you spun a lightclone at him. The lightclone, whose origin was a portmanteau of lightning and cyclone, was a powerful cyclone who struck its enemies with lightning bolts once contained.

Dan the demon quickly fell prey to the potent spell, screaming as he was struck repeatedly. He managed to teleport himself away as you approached the other Kat. In truth, she did not resemble your Kat either in looks and certainly not in personality. This Kat was a cold, cruel sadist who thought of no-one but her arrogant self. "Are you ok?" you ask. "Who or what are you?" the evil Kat sneered. Your Kat held you tight and glared at her cruel otherworld self. "She is my Danni! Not a monster like you! Or the demon that tried to kill you!" she spat. You blinked and the link was severed. "The demon will return, I trust you two can protect your daughter?" you ask the parents of Kat. They did not have the strength or energy of your parents. Whatever made this world different, you were glad you were not in it. "You're Dan from another world! And you're part witch and part demon and destined for the Kat of your world!" she stated.

"You are correct!" you explain. "Ew! You're such freaks!" she declared. You tremble, the pain and anger whipping in you. It wasn't your Kat, but a version of her saying this. Kat held you tighter but tears still fell from your face. "What a baby! Did I upset wittle.." Your true love showed how different she was by punching the other Kat in the nose. "She protected you, you cow! Prima Transforma Infanta Permanente!" she cried. The other Kat quickly reverted to a newborn, screaming and crying. "And stay that way, you heartless monster!" she exclaimed. You could not help but grin. "Raise her better this time! Or should I say them!" you added. The parents holding the former evil witch stared at you. "The spell she cast bound her brother to her. All she did was separate him from his body. So a malevolent monster could take his place. She and her brother are still together, but in one body. Good luck, Mum and Dad! Let's go, sweetheart!" you declare, taking her with you.

You are soon back at the school. "The demon tried an inversion spell to kill my soul mate by using an alternate. I severed the connection and cast a powerful protection spell on Kat! He will still try something else!" you reveal to the others. You felt loathing towards the teacher as they stare at you, blankly. "Evil Parallel universe, Danni saved stupid evil me from her demon brother! So how do we restart time, beloved?" she asked. After swooning briefly as she called you beloved, you suggest that....
15533211211212122111111221112.title: something else

155332112112121221111112211121.content:
"We need to form a coven and use that magic to bring time back! It will be difficult! Kat and I will get things ready. I want the rest of you to stay together and form a circle. No-one and I mean no-one wanders off! The demon could return!" "I am already here!" declared a voice behind you. You shoot light into front of you and the demon flies into a wall. "Almost had you!" he grunted. "Who are you?" Kat cried. "He is Asteroth!" you answer. Suddenly you understood all of it, including why this is happening. How this happened, you aren't sure. The demon's eyes flashed malevolently. "Your powers have weakened, Asteroth!" you reply.

"I am stronger than you think!" "I am not like him! I am not Ezekiel!" you try to explain. "You are his descendant! You descend from his youngest! I was foolish! Your woman was not like Ezekiel or her, but you are! What are you doing but following your aunt http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite... ? I have watched your dimension hopping ancestor creating trouble after trouble, I will not allow it here! In all parallel worlds, Katelyn Goode is an evil witch; but here you are the evil one! The last world I visited (http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...); your cousin was changing, becoming more like her. I will not allow another Ashley Barker! Your coven is no different to the Society of Justice that plans to cause havoc in the universe we descend from!" he cried.

"We are just young women! We want to experience life and love! We don't want to wipe out the male gender!" you protest. "I will not let Barker's niece take this world! I will destroy you, Danielle Goode! You, your woman and your children! I won't rest until all of you are dead!" he roared, dodging a fire blast from your dragon. "Asteroth, stop this! These women are innocent, if you must punish anyone, punish me!" you plead. "NOOO!!!" cried Kat and Carrie. "You are not enough! All of them must fall; your mother, your faeries, your dragon, your coven and this school! Barker attacked and almost killed me! While the brothers stand idle and the Consul Karak returns; the balance is being disrupted! I cannot stop them, but I can stop it here! I will find a way!" he bellowed, launching a series of attacks that would make Avatar look like a child. You use your blade and deflect them all, before shooting light at Asteroth. He almost teleports away, but the blast knocks him back.

He clutches at his ribs as he begins to glow. "This isn't over!" he shouted, fading away. "He will be back. My spell will only disrupt him temporarily! His powers are growing...I...I don't know if I can stop you!" you cry, tears running down your face as you try to regain your breath. Kat pulls you to her, her tender touch helping you recharge. The kiss fills you with a sense of peace as you pull Kat closer to you. She wraps her legs around you as you begin to shake. You recognise a love fusing spell is beginning to take place. As both your and Kat's clothes begin to fade, you hear Carrie's distant voice and you force yourself to stop. You and Kat are panting as the others gather to learn what had happened. You are on your haunches as you hold a hand up. "Pair bonding can be draining too!" you giggle. Kat giggles back. "Kat, Carrie and I are...descendants of a fallen angel called Ezekiel. His eldest daughter is planning to wipe out the Y chromosome in her world. That world (http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...) is older than ours. It is a world where angels live. His younger daughter came to this world and had a child. All the Goode family descended from that child. Asteroth planned to have me kill Kat, not knowing that I would have the power of Ezekiel inside me. But Kat and I are meant to be, so he failed! If you join our coven, Asteroth will try to hunt you down. He has angelic heritage as well; I am not sure if he is a fallen angel or a descendant of one!" you explain. After a brief pause, they all agree to be part of the coven. "Then let us begin!" you command, taking Kat's hand with your left and your daughter Carrie's with your right.
155332112112121221111112211121.title: form the coven and use that magic

1553322.content:
Dan changes venue. He knows he can't just sit there and let his sister find him. So he flies, as best he can, up to a tree. There, a Hummingbird family takes him in as he thinks to himself.

"Now what should I do."

"EAT! EAT!" the chicks reply.

"Eventually...I mean now. Do I go back to her...or..."

Suddenly, he realizes something. "Wait. Ken knows a lot about this stuff."

"WHO'S KEN WHO'S KEN?" The birds bark.

"He's my tutor."

"TUTOR?"

"Well, I'm not going to my friends like this. And besides, he's always talking about stuff like this as if he knows what he's talking about. Yeah...of course he's over at the University, and that's ten miles from here. Crap! Well, I'd better start now."

"OOOHHH, MOM FOOD, MOM FOOD!" The Chicks begin whistling, "MEMEMEMEMEMEMEMEEMEMEMEMEMEMEM!"

The noise is horrendous but ends quickly as the mother stuffs some of the food down the mouth of the first chick she gets too. She then turns to Dan and responds,

"So, have you figured things out yet?"

"Yes, I'm heading to college. Well, just to visit...the sound of more school really sucks."

"Well, if your going to the one over there, I'll get you some help...as soon as my husband arrives."

"DAD HAS FOOD! DAD HAS FOOD! DAD HAS FOOD!"

"Sure, why not."

If the day couldn't get weirder, Dan eventually finds himself ridding on the back of a Vulture. The entire time, the bird has the nerve to hum to the tune 'Food Glorious Food' Except when he spots a Deer near the interstate. Then its,

"Ooh, that's going to be a decent meal latter on."

Dan looks down and spots the Deer. 'Okaaay.'

Eventually the Vulture passes up to the edge of the large campus, where it starts.

"Dear lady, we are now over Central University Campus. The population is 28,000 screaming potential dishes, all stressing themselves out over exams, and drinking themselves onto a table near you."

Dan looks around the large campus. Its easy to identify features on the campus, but its the clock he's primarily interested in.

"Good, its two ten," he starts, "Ken is a creature of habit, and he should be heading to his car, which means..."

Down on a path that seems to be completely separate from campus (even though it passes right down the middle of it) a man walks, hunched over and worn out. He wears a heavy backpack, and looks like he's about to fall over. He yawns before talking to himself,

"I work on that thing for two weeks, go all night making his corrections, and he acts like...I don't have a thesis. Screw him...in an hour I'll be home, and I can call this day over."

The man doesn't even notice the small voice call out,

"Hey Ken."

He keeps walking even as the voice yells,

"KEN!"

Dan tries on more time, screaming at the top his lungs, "KEEEEEEN!"

Finally, the man stops, and looks around. He barely notices anything unusual. then suddenly, a giant fly catches his eye. At first he wants to swat it, but in his tired state, he realizes its too big to be a fly, in fact, its wearing a leaf...and looks human. He focuses his tired eyes and realizes that,

"And just like that, the day is in extra innings." He states groggily. He then responds, "You do realize your mythical, right?"

Dan just looks at the man. "Its me Dan, your six o'clock, Monday and Thursday tutor."

Ken can't help but to look suspicious. "Okay...Dan...why are we faeries today?"

"My sister is a witch, and she used some sort of spell to turn me into...into this!"

On the off chance that she may be telling the truth, Ken straitens up, and begins focusing his mental effort of the girl. Meanwhile he asks,

"So...why did you come to me? And I know you don't like your sister too much, but witch?"

"I mean a real witch. A Cauldron stirring, pointy hat wearing, broom ridding, old TV show having witch! And you always talk about this stuff as if you know something about it, I figured...you're better than what options I have."

Dan sounds desperate. The man's scan returns that this little fairy may not be what it appears to be. So he thinks for a moment, then turns back down the path.

"Fallow me." Ken states and starts down the path.

Dan fallows. He adopts a slightly high altitude, out of both embarrassment, and caution...he doesn't want to be caught at all like this. He fallows Ken to the gym, where he enters threw the main entrance. Ken purposely leaves the door open long enough for Dan to fly threw. The gym's twenty foot ceilings make it easy for him to fly threw the space above the traffic of the college students. Ken leads him to a locker room in the back of the practically empty place, then too a small storage area in the space. Dan finally lands on a pool robot, exhausted from his flight. Ken checks around the space, making sure its clear, then presents himself to Dan.

"Okay, I'm going to show you something...if you tell anyone, not only will you stay that way, but I'll sell you to the bio-science department."

"Deal." Dan states wondering whats going on.

At that moment, Ken places his backpack on the floor. He drops his chin to his chest, and closes his eyes. A light then begins to envelope him. Instantly, his form morphs from the twenty year old man to a eight year old girl, wearing some sort of robe and pleated pants the likes of which Dan has never seen before. After a moment Ken, with his Chinese girl hair cut, opens his eyes and looks to Dan.

"Okay, now for your..." Ken pauses as he watches Dan's shocked face. In his new form, Ken easily senses Dan's soul trapped in this small body, and can detect the remains of the energy that created it. That's not why he stopped.

Dan nearly falls over laughing at Ken's new form. It irritates Ken.

"You turn into a little girl!" Dan laughs.

"Boy..." Ken corrects, "and look who's talking Tinkerbell. At least I can transform back and forth at will. You're stuck."

Dan immediately stops laughing and sits back up. Ken kneels down in front of Dan. Within a few seconds, he has a solution ready in his mind.

"I'm sorry man." Dan responds. "Its just been an...odd day."

"Yeah, well I have an appointment with Death latter today. So we need to hurry this up."

"You're dying?" Dan asks a little shocked.

"Huh, no...I mean we're just meeting up...that's all. Now, about your problem. I can easily restore you, that's simple. the problem is what to do next. If your sister has this ability, there is nothing to stop her from repeating this assault. I won't help you kill her, or anything like that, but I can help you...even the odds. But its up too you."
1553322.title: Take a gamble

info.brief_description: You are Dan a teenage boy of 16, Your older sister has her birthday today.
info.description:
You are Dan, A nice friendly teenage-boy of 16 years old. You always had problems with your sister Kat. Unknowing to you, your Mother used to be a Witch (She gave up her powers so she could lead a normal life) On Kat's 18th birthday she will inherit these powers. She has plenty of Evil plans to humiliate her little brother and she will not hesitate to put them to action. :P


Ze rules:

I do not want Death, Unbirthing, Aged to Dust, Regression to a sperm-cel. Growing to Giant. (Aging and Regression are allowed, But don't exaggerate)

I encourage Transformations, but others things are welcome, For example Kat could use her Magic to let the whole world treat her brother as a Dog without actually transforming him. You can replace the word "Dog" with for example "Baby"or "Cow"

Shrinking is allowed aslong as she treats Dan as her Pet.
Fattening is only allowed if your going to change Dan into a Pig
Yes, you can also change Dan into a Female, Be carefull not to let him turn 18 or else he will also has Witch powers, Or take certain
measures.

If I didn't forbid it, everything is allowed..

Now I will not complain about a few spelling errors, I will be putting this story up from my Harddisk with a lot of old stories, some of them might have typpos : )

If you are going to add to "something else/options" please remember to put a choice chapter first, there you will enter your option (example: Chicken) and again "something else"
Then you will add to your "Chicken option. This is much easier for me as people who want to have a diffrent option can still add. I hope writing.com will give more choice options in the future but for now it's only 2. (excluding the first chapters)
